translated: The body, the intuition, the sky, the wind, the fire, the water, the earth, the moving and unmoving, the gods, the pure, the existent, the nonexistent, the tenfold, are said to be the vajra body.

original: sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te //
analyzed: sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te //

analyzed: de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs min sems kyis kun du rtog pa dag las grol /

original: 5 / g-yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g-yas su dmar po'i mdog / sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang // mjug rings dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun po //

original: 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o /
analyzed: 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o /

original: 6 / rgyab tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhu sa ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: 6 / rgyab tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhu sa ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so //
translated: The yellow behind is the lunar mansion, the bow of the god of love, that is divided into two groups of four.

original: srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o //
analyzed: srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o //
translated: The single wind called life becomes tenfold, at the top, the base, and in front.

original: dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu gnas //
analyzed: dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu gnas //
translated: Above the vajra in the middle is the seed syllable with its power and a host of qualities, below.

original: kun du ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol /ğŸ”½7 / aa sogs sum cu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang //

translated: All things are completely liberated by wisdom and emptiness, peace and the place of peace.ğŸ”½The thirty vowels beginning with a, endowed with ya, ra, la, and va, are the lunar digits and the sun.

original: ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed //
analyzed: ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed //
translated: The groups beginning with ka, together with the vowels, are enjoyed by the measure of the fire of sixteen thousand days.

original: ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha min gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa //
analyzed: ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha min gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa //
translated: The vowels such as â€œhaâ€ are the abodes of the nÄgas, asuras, and bhÅ«tas.

analyzed: aa sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi yi bdag 8 / dbyangs ni ka tsa ta pa tar ldan  ka la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas //
translated: From the vowels and consonants such as â€œaâ€ and â€œka,â€ the three worlds are definitely generated, O lord of men. The vowels are endowed with â€œka,â€ â€œca,â€ â€œá¹­a,â€ â€œta,â€ and â€œá¸a,â€ and the consonants are endowed with â€œaâ€ and so on.

original: mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go //
analyzed: mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go //
translated: The upper part of the throat and palate is generated from space, wind, and fire. The lips and teeth are generated from water and earth.

original: aa sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste //
analyzed: aa sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste //
translated: The vowels â€œaâ€ and so on are in the head cakra, the throat cakra, the heart cakra, the navel cakra, and the secret cakra, respectively.

original: sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o /
analyzed: sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o /
translated: They are endowed with the aggregates, elements, and sense bases, which are black, red, white, and golden.

original: 9 / rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis //
analyzed: 9 / rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis //
translated: From the end of the wind maá¹‡á¸ala to the end of Meru, the hells and the city of the nÄgas are two hundred thousand leagues.

original: lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshogs @3a * //
analyzed: lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshogs @3a * //
translated: The measure of Meru is one hundred thousand [leagues];

original: kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga //
analyzed: kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga //
translated: from the abode of the planets [it is] twenty-five thousand [leagues].

original: mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phang g-yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga //
analyzed: mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phang g-yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga //
translated: The neck [of Meru] is fifty [thousand leagues], and the face [of Meru] is twenty-five [thousand leagues].

original: de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o /
analyzed: de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis dman pa'o /
translated: Beyond that is the single empty [space] devoid of the three existences, devoid of qualities, and inferior to that.

original: 10 / rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams //
analyzed: 10 / rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams //
translated: From the edge of the wind [mandala] to the edge of the wind [mandala] is the foundation of the stable earth, with its continents, mountains, and oceans.

original: bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis //
analyzed: bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis //
translated: Two hundred thousand [leagues] with four sides, and the moving mandala of Meru is two hundred thousand [leagues].

original: dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste //
analyzed: dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste //
translated: In the middle is Meru, upon which the wheel of houses with the stars revolves day and night.

original: cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes /
analyzed: cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes /
translated: In the six parts, there are two hundred thousand leagues. The entire three worlds arise from the conjunctions of time.

original: 11 /'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: 11 /'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste //
translated: The circumference of the world is three times the diameter.

original: sa yi 'khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so //
analyzed: sa yi 'khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so //
translated: The circumference of the earth is three hundred thousand leagues. The circumferences of water, fire, and wind are six, nine, and twelve hundred thousand leagues, respectively.

original: mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa //
analyzed: mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa //
translated: The external three worlds of the lord of humans are one hundred thousand leagues.

original: de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo /ğŸ”½12 / phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste //
analyzed: de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo / 12 / phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste //
translated: In the realm of the earth, they are one cubit in size.ğŸ”½Eight paramÄá¹‡us are one aá¹‡u. Eight aá¹‡us are one louse egg.

original: 'di rnams kyis ni ske tshe shig dang nas te ltos 'gro nas kyis sor te ser mo nyi ma ni //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis ni ske tshe shig dang nas te ltos 'gro nas kyis sor te ser mo nyi ma ni //
translated: Eight of those are one louse. Eight of those are one barley seed. Eight of those are one finger width. Twenty-four of those are one hand width.

original: zung gis khru'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: zung gis khru'o khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur //
translated: Two thousand of these cubits make one dhanus. Four dhanus make one kroÅ›a.

original: rgyang grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad de yis lha yul sa dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no /
analyzed: rgyang grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshad de yis lha yul sa dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no /
translated: Four kroÅ›as make one yojana, the measure of the heavens, earth, and space.ğŸ”½First, there are two sets of sets of two kalpas: the set of two kalpas of the good dharma and the set of two kalpas of the world beyond.

original: 13 / dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go //
analyzed: 13 / dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // dpal gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go //
translated: The set of two kalpas of the white kalpa of glory is the set of two kalpas of complete mastery. These are the eleven sets of two kalpas.

original: gzugs med dag ni aa sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te ai la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs //
analyzed: gzugs med dag ni aa sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te ai la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs //
translated: The four formless realms are the four beginning with A, free of the union of HA. The sixteen beginning with I are form.

original: ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o /
analyzed: ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o /
translated: The ten desires are the final HA, etc. The single sibilant is KA SA.

original: 14 / srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye @3b bas khams gsum mo //
analyzed: 14 / srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye @3b bas khams gsum mo //
translated: The three existences are the thirty-one. The three existences are the three realms, divided by realms.

original: srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te aa sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te aa sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: The three worlds are the three vajras, divided into the vowels and consonants.

original: rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The jewel-light, the sand-water, and the hell-water are said to be the seventh, the sand-water the second,ğŸ”½the mud-water, the unbearable smoke, the fire, the darkness, the great hell,

original: 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzad du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni du 'bod bdun pa dang / 15 / lan tshva chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni //
analyzed: 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzad du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni du 'bod bdun pa dang / 15 / lan tshva chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni //
translated: the salt, the liquor, the water, the milk, the curd, the ghee, and the honey oceans, and the mountains.

original: 'od sngon manda ra ri ni sha ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro na bsil ri rdo rje'o //
analyzed: 'od sngon manda ra ri ni sha ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro na bsil ri rdo rje'o //
translated: The blue-light, the Mandara, the Satha, the jewel-light, the warm-cool, the vajra,ğŸ”½the moon, the white-light, the supreme, the Kusha, the kinnara, the crane,

original: gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag na rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi'am ci dang khrung khrung dang // drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste bdun pa 'dzam bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyi sa /
analyzed: gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag na rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi'am ci dang khrung khrung dang // drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste bdun pa 'dzam bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyi sa /
translated: the Rudra, the enjoyment, the seventh, the Jambudvipa, the abode of men, the karma-land.

original: 16 / shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo //
analyzed: 16 / shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo //
translated: In the east the wind is very round; in the south, O King, the fire is triangular.

original: byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchog sa ni chu yi gter gyi zur //
analyzed: byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchog sa ni chu yi gter gyi zur //
translated: In the north the water is half-moon shaped; in the west the excellent gold earth is square.

original: ri rab lhun po stod pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste //
analyzed: ri rab lhun po stod pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste //

analyzed: sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur / 17 / lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni //
translated: On the earth, in the directions, are the mountains, the nÄgas, the planets, and the directions, each a thousand yojanas.ğŸ”½The diameter of the upper Meru and the extent of the earth are five thousand yojanas.

original: lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la 'khor yug dag gi yang dag ste //
analyzed: lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la 'khor yug dag gi yang dag ste //
translated: One is the excellent earth; the rest are the spheres.

original: rva ni lnga po rnams dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni khor yug go //
analyzed: rva ni lnga po rnams dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni khor yug go //
translated: The five horns are above, and all around is the outer ring.

original: de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun du me dang rlung /
analyzed: de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun du me dang rlung /
translated: Outside of that are the continents, mountains, and oceans, and in all directions are fire, wind, and water.

original: 18 / chu gter drug po thams cad dag kyang zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste //
analyzed: 18 / chu gter drug po thams cad dag kyang zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste //
translated: All six oceans are one thousand yojanas less than the previous, and each is double the previous in circumference.

original: gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong phrag stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni //
analyzed: gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong phrag stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni //
translated: The continents and the best of the mountain ranges are also twenty-five thousand yojanas in size.

original: 'dzam bu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshva'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te //
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshva'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te //
translated: The width of JambudvÄ«pa is one hundred thousand yojanas.

original: srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no /
analyzed: srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no /
translated: The fire and wind at the end of the three existences are the same size.

original: 19 / tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste //
analyzed: 19 / tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste //
translated: In the realm of BrahmÄ, the supreme Victor, the KÄlacakra, is praised by the assembly of gods.

analyzed: lhun po la ni tshig mda'i tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o //
translated: On Meru are the hosts of the á¹šá¹£is, and in the underworld are the five classes of nÄgas.

original: dpal ldan @4a * //
analyzed: dpal ldan @4a * //
translated: GloriousğŸ”½

original: lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun du sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas //
analyzed: lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun du sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas //
translated: all the abodes that are on the surface of the earth in all directions of Meru, the neighboring regions,

original: zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar /
analyzed: zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar /
translated: the fields, the desire realms, the inhabited continents, and the pleasure groves, up to the end of the northeast,

original: 20 / shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu //
analyzed: 20 / shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu //
translated: Indra in the east, Agni in the south, Yama in the west, and RÄká¹£asa in the north,

original: rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang //
analyzed: rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang //
translated: VÄyu in the northeast, Kubera in the southwest, and RÄhu in the northwest.

original: tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong ba ste //
analyzed: tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyong ba ste //
translated: Above and below, BrahmÄ and Viá¹£á¹‡u, along with their retinues, protect and guard their respective directions.

original: de dag dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku /
analyzed: de dag dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku /
translated: In the middle of them is the invincible vajra body of the supreme victor KÄlacakra, the creator.

original: 21 / lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor //
analyzed: 21 / lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor //
translated: In the regions behind the mountain, on the earth, the demigods, difficult to conquer, are in array.

original: gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed //
analyzed: gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed //
translated: There, where the Dharma is declining, he enters the Age of Strife.

original: kla klo rnams kyang g-yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu //
analyzed: kla klo rnams kyang g-yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu //
translated: Having conquered the barbarians in battle, he establishes them in his own religion, and goes on to victory.

original: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: The other ages, the Perfect, the Three and a Half, the Two and a Half, and the Age of Strife, will come about in their order.

original: 22 / dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can de rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de //
analyzed: 22 / dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can de rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de //
translated: In whatever part of the world the powerful Cakravartin sets his foot, there the Perfect Age begins.

original: rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no //
translated: Behind the king, the Three and a Half Age; in front, the Age of Strife; between the two, the Two and a Half Age.

original: dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste //
analyzed: dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste //
translated: The measure of the ages is twenty-one thousand years, with a remainder of a hundred.

original: re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o /
analyzed: re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o /
translated: The measure of each is the one hundred years of humans, converted by the measure of time and the measure of the arrow.

original: 23 / phra dbugs dhru dang chu tshod nyin zhag dhru dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
analyzed: 23 / phra dbugs dhru dang chu tshod nyin zhag dhru dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
translated: The twenty-one thousand six hundred breaths, the four times, are the measure of one day and night of the body born of subtle elements, of humans, of bhÅ«tas, of gods, and of asuras.ğŸ”½The measure of one day and night of the powerful and the chief is the measure of the four times on the earth.

original: nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad de sa gzhi dag la dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug / dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so /
analyzed: nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad de sa gzhi dag la dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug / dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so /
translated: The twelve suns in one day and night travel the peaceful stage, section by section.

original: 24 / phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: 24 / phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis //
translated: The directions, the full moon, the end, the four times, and the fire time are the two types of travel.

original: rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srad rnams te //
analyzed: rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srad rnams te //
translated: The king, the full year, the day and night, the time periods, the hours, and the water measures.

original: 'di @4b rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
analyzed: 'di @4b rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
translated: and of those born in the body, the subtle, and the powerful, each day.

original: nus dang gtso bo'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no /
analyzed: nus dang gtso bo'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no /
translated: In the middle of the body, in the abode of the three existences, it is the same.

original: 25 / lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa shambha la zhes bya bar 'byung //
analyzed: 25 / lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa shambha la zhes bya bar 'byung //
translated: From this year, in six hundred years, the king of men, Åšambhala, will appear.ğŸ”½Then, in one hundred years of the nÄgas, the religion of the barbarians will certainly spread in the land of Makha.

original: de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par ma kha'i yul du kla klo'i chos dag rab tu 'jug / de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya //
analyzed: de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par ma kha'i yul du kla klo'i chos dag rab tu 'jug / de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya //
translated: At that time, in the zodiac of the DvÄpara age, men will know the activity of the little one.

original: mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur /
analyzed: mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur /
translated: At that time, the doctrines on the entire earth will be destroyed by the power of time.

original: 26 / me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i lor ni rab tu grub //
analyzed: 26 / me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i lor ni rab tu grub //
translated: The past, such as the ascetics, will be mixed in the fire, the sky, and the ocean, and will be established as the year of the barbarians.

analyzed: kla klo'i dbang po'i lo ni lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag ma dag kyang nyi mas bsgyur //
translated: The remaining days of the year, less the months of the demon's hand, are converted by the sun.

analyzed: nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam bar dbye //
translated: The months of Aá¹£Äá¸hÄ and so forth, mixed with the moon, are converted by the time below, divided by the moon of the zodiac.

original: rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur /
analyzed: rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur /
translated: The sum of the gains above is the pure sum of the moon of the lord of men.

analyzed: 27 / zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur //
translated: The sum of the three places of the moon, multiplied by the middle group, is the sum of the gains, converted by the hand of the topknot.

analyzed: rtsa ba dag la drug gi chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang bar bya //
translated: The sum of the roots is divided by six, and that is the debt. The middle [sum] is to be purified.

analyzed: steng 'og dag las mig dang sum cu'i nor ni bsres pa gsal bar bya ste drug cu'i cha dag gis //
translated: The sum of the eyes and thirty from the top and bottom is mixed and clarified by the sixty parts.

analyzed: rnyed pa steng du rab bsres thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur /

analyzed: 28 / gnas gnyis nyi zla bsres pa dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni //

analyzed: de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs //
translated: The sum of the elements is divided by eight and two, and the remainder is added to the first place.ğŸ”½The three places, the middle one and the two below it, are ruled by Åšiva.

analyzed: gnas gsum dbu ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis cha thob par //

analyzed: gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gis thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni /
translated: The sum of the two mixed is in the inferior middle place. The sum of the hours is subtracted from the sum of the elements, and the remainder is added to the first place.

analyzed: 29 / bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur //

analyzed: gza' la gza' ni rab sbyin mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs dag la yang gnyis //

translated: Multiply by sixty, and the result is the number of hours. Divide by the sahama of the moon. The remainder is the work of the slow [sahama]. The sahama of wealth and the sahama of debt are in reverse and forward order, respectively.

analyzed: longs spyod kyis ni chu tshod bsgyur las mda' dang yon tan zla bas 'khor lo phyed las cha thob pa //
translated: the sahama of enjoyment is the hours multiplied by the sahama of the bow. The sahama of qualities is the half circle multiplied by the sahama of the moon.

original: snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur //
analyzed: snga ma phyed la gzung byar 'dod de rkang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyed la dor byar 'gyur //
translated: The first half is to be taken. By the power of the foot, the second half is to be discarded in the same way.

original: zos pa tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o /
analyzed: zos pa tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba dag kyang chu tshod la'o /
translated: Having made a single group of the consumed, the distribution and discarding of the hours is by the power of the motion of the planets.

original: 42 / de nas nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o //
analyzed: 42 / de nas nyi mar sa skyes rnam par sbyang ste bla ma nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o //
translated: Then, having subtracted the sun from the ascendant of the day, [the result] is added to the ascendant of the teacher for a swift action.

original: zla skyes dkar po la yang nyi ma dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur //
analyzed: zla skyes dkar po la yang nyi ma dag ste myur ba'i las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur //
translated: And the sun is subtracted from the white moon ascendant; for a swift action, it is certain that the order is reversed.

original: sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste bza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bsgyur //
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i lhag mas 'dir ni rkang pa dag ste bza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i chu tshod bsgyur //
translated: The remainder of the subtracted [amount] is added to the ascendant here; the remainder of the ascendant is multiplied by the elapsed hours.

original: drug cu'i cha yis thob pa bza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid /
analyzed: drug cu'i cha yis thob pa bza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid /
translated: The result divided by sixty is added to the ascendant; it is to be taken from the ascendant in the same way.

original: 43 / zos pa dag ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste //
analyzed: 43 / zos pa dag ni tshogs gcig byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang dor ba mtha' dag ste //
translated: Having made the sum of the eaten [amount], the entire [amount] is to be given and subtracted by the power of the motion of the planets.

original: sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag gzhag par bya //
analyzed: sa skyes la ni rkang pa rgyal ba sogs te rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag gzhag par bya //
translated: The ascendant is added to the feet of the ascendant of the day, and the entire [amount] is placed in the position of the most clear [planet].

original: de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi ba rig par bya'o mi yi dbang //
analyzed: de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi ba rig par bya'o mi yi dbang //
translated: In this way, O lord of men, the order of all the planets is to be fully calculated.

original: zla skyes dkar po las ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur /
analyzed: zla skyes dkar po las ni nyin mor byed pas rnam dag zla skyes dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur /
translated: The moon, white, is born from the white lunar mansions. The sun, red, is born from the red lunar mansions.

original: 44 / stong dang nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag tshogs la me dang nyi ma ri yis dman //
analyzed: 44 / stong dang nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha' dag nyin zhag tshogs la me dang nyi ma ri yis dman //
translated: The sun, moon, and lunar mansions are all divided by the number of days in the lunar month.

original: ri nas phug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur //
analyzed: ri nas phug pa ri dang klu yis bgo ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur //
translated: The remainder is divided by the number of stars, etc.

original: rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: rab brjod cha yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams ni zla skyes longs spyod dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The lunar mansions are divided by the number of lunar days, and the lunar days by the number of hours.

translated: The moon is subtracted from the sun, and the good king is subtracted from the star.ğŸ”½The remaining work is done as in the case of Mars, with the distinction of slow and fast.

analyzed: zla skyes rkang pa dal ba'i las la bcu ri me ste myur ba'i las la mi bdag la sogs so //
translated: The slow work of the moon is done by the tenth, and the fast work by the king, etc.

original: nyin zhag tshogs ni mkha' mkha' ro dang mig gis dman par byas nas so me chu gter dag gis bgo / lhag ma skar mas bsnun las skar ma slar yang chu tshod bla ma yi yang dal ba'i las la'o /

translated: The day and night are divided by the zodiac, the zodiac by the signs, the signs by the degrees, the degrees by the minutes, and the minutes by the seconds.ğŸ”½The zodiac is divided by the sun, the signs by the moon, the degrees by RÄhu, and the minutes by Ketu, in the case of slow motion.

translated: The degrees are divided by the sun, the minutes by the moon, the seconds by RÄhu, and the seconds by Ketu, in the case of fast motion.ğŸ”½The day and night are divided by the zodiac, the zodiac by the signs, the signs by the degrees, the degrees by the minutes, and the minutes by the seconds. The zodiac is divided by the sun, the signs by the moon, the degrees by RÄhu, and the minutes by Ketu, in the case of slow motion.

original: 47 / rgyu skar dus ni nyi ma la sbyang  mda' dus ri bong can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste //
analyzed: 47 / rgyu skar dus ni nyi ma la sbyang  mda' dus ri bong can ni dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste //

translated: The [places] of the swift, the [places] of the slow, and so forth, are divided into six, and the [places] of the swift, the [places] of the slow, and so forth, are divided into six.ğŸ”½The sum of the days of the bright fortnight, less the days of the bright fortnight of the Vedas, less the days of the bright fortnight of the nÄgas, and less the days of the bright fortnight of the stars, is the number of days of the dark fortnight.

analyzed: bgo zhing skar mas bsgyur las skar mar 'gyur te spen pa yi ni dor bya dag kyang bco brgyad do /

original: 49 / gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur //
analyzed: 49 / gang dag su zhig nyi ma'i longs spyod la ni rab zhugs gza' de dag kyang nges par nub par 'gyur //

analyzed: nyi ma btang nas 'char bar 'gyur te de yi lam yang bgrod pa 'gro ba'i rnam par dbye bas so //

original: g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g-yon nas 'gro ba ste //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i lam la gnas pa gang yin de ni nyi ma 'gro ba'i dbang gis g-yon nas 'gro ba ste //

original: dgra dag 'gyur na nges par 'thab pa'o //
analyzed: dgra dag 'gyur na nges par 'thab pa'o //

original: skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thob pa min par nges shing 'dir ni phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan //
analyzed: skar ma la ste gzhan la 'thob pa min par nges shing 'dir ni phan tshun mtshungs pa dag tu ldan //

analyzed: gal te nyi ma yi ni g-yon du zla ba rab zhugs gyur cing 'byung ba yang ni g-yon pa yis //

original: byang gi rva ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig tu ni bgrod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g-yas pa yang /
analyzed: byang gi rva ni mtho bar 'gyur te kha cig tu ni bgrod pa'i dbang gis lho ru g-yas pa yang /
translated: The northern horn is high, and in some places it is to the south by the power of the passage.

original: 51 / tshigs mtshams su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ste mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 51 / tshigs mtshams su yang sgra gcan gdong dang mnyam par 'gro ste mngon du phyogs par 'dzin pa kho na'o //
translated: At the joints, RÄhu moves in the same way as the face, and it is only held to be facing.

original: g-yon du rgyu ba dag la g-yas min du ste nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis g-yas la g-yas pa'i char //ğŸ”½de ltar sgra gcan gyis ni phyogs mtshams su 'dzin ri bong 'dzin pa 'byung ba dag ni rgyab tu mang //

translated: For those moving to the left, it is not to the right, and by the power of the passage of the sun, to the right is the right part.ğŸ”½Thus, RÄhu is held in the directions and intermediate directions, and the rising of the moon is behind.

original: tha skar la sogs nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su go la'i  ri mo'o /
analyzed: tha skar la sogs nag pa phyed du nyin dang mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dbus su go la'i  ri mo'o /
translated: In the first half of the dark half of Má¹›gaÅ›irÄ and so on, the line of the celestial globe is in the middle of the equal day and night.

original: 52 / rgyu skar g-yas dang g-yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag gnas /
analyzed: 52 / rgyu skar g-yas dang g-yas min dag la nges par srid pa'i gnas su khyim gyi dbye bas yang dag gnas /
translated: The naká¹£atras to the right and left are definitely situated in the abodes of existence by the division of the houses.

original: gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //
analyzed: gzhu yi rnam pa'i dus khyim dag la go la'i dbus nas lhor ni me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //
translated: In the houses of the zodiac in the form of a bow, from the center of the celestial globe, in the south, the mandala of fire abides.

original: byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o //
analyzed: byang du de ni bsil ba'i ri ste pad 'dab bzang po bzhin du shar du lug dang srang sogs la'o //
translated: In the north, it is the Cool Mountain, like a good lotus leaf, in the east, Aries, Libra, etc.

original: me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mda' ri'o /
analyzed: me nas bsil ba'i ri yi mtshams su dpag tshad stong phrag mkha' dang nam mkha' mkha' dang mda' ri'o /
translated: Between the south and the Cool Mountain, a thousand leagues, the sky, the sky, the sky, and the long arrow.

analyzed: 53 / dbus su 'khor lo phyed kyi ri mo nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag kyang mtshan mo gcig ni mnyam pa la'o //
translated: In the middle, the half-wheel mountain, the sun's path, and the night are equal.

analyzed: phyi nas g-yas dang g-yas min dag tu rgyu ste nyin dang mtshan mo rgyu skar dbye bas rim pa yis //
translated: Then, to the right and left, it moves, the day and night, by the division of the lunar mansions, in order.

analyzed: lam rnams mkha' klu zla ba 'dor zhing nyin dang mtshan mo  dag kyang ji srid bkod pa dag gi mthar //
translated: The paths, the sky, the naga, the moon, the day and night, as long as the end of the zodiac.

original: nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so /
analyzed: nyi ma ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu dag las 'grib dang 'phel ba drug chas so /
translated: The sun and the moon, in day and night, decrease and increase by six parts out of sixty.

original: 54 / gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o //
analyzed: 54 / gang phyir ri la skye bo rnams kyi nyin mtshan mnyam par 'gyur te lug nyi srang gi nyi ma la'o //
translated: Because for people on the mountain, day and night are equal, in the sun of Aries and Libra.

original: de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par glang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no //
analyzed: de phyir gnyis brgyad dum bu dag la nges par glang la gnas dang sdig pa la gnas de bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, in the two-eighth parts, the sun is certainly in Taurus and in Virgo.

original: bug pa zhes bya me grangs dag la 'khrig pa gzhur gnas phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la ni //
analyzed: bug pa zhes bya me grangs dag la 'khrig pa gzhur gnas phyogs kyi tshad dang bzhi pa dag la ni //
translated: In the hole-named parts, the sun is in Libra and in Capricorn.

original: nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang /
analyzed: nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pa dag dang chu srin la gnas lnga pa bcu gcig pa la yang /
translated: The sun is in Cancer and in Aquarius in the fifth and eleventh parts.

original: 55 / seng ge bum par rab bzhugs bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o //
analyzed: 55 / seng ge bum par rab bzhugs bcu gnyis ro yi sar ni nya dang bu mor gnas pa dag la'o //
translated: In the twelfth part, the sun is in Leo in the house of the lion, and in Pisces and in Virgo.

analyzed: 'dir ni @7b g-yon bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma chu srin gnas pa la ste bum par nyi mas gnyis pa la //

original: nya la dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par ro //
analyzed: nya la dum bu gsum par mi rnams kyi ni bgrod pa dag kyang lug gi nyi mas bzhi par ro //
translated: In the third part, the sun is in Pisces, and in Aries in the fourth part.

original: 'byung ba zhes byar nyi ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi gnas sa ni drug pa bdun par yang /
analyzed: 'byung ba zhes byar nyi ma glang la gnas pas 'khrig par nyi gnas sa ni drug pa bdun par yang /
translated: In the fifth house, the sun is in Taurus, and in Gemini in the sixth and seventh parts.

original: 56 / nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pas 'gyur te seng ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad par ro //
analyzed: 56 / nyi ma ka rka ta la gnas pas 'gyur te seng ge la gnas sa yi dum bu brgyad par ro //

original: bu mos bug par srang gi nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o //ğŸ”½gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs kyis la'o //
analyzed: bu mos bug par srang gi nyi mas bcu par 'gyur te sdig pa yis kyang drag po'i dum bu la'o // gzhu la gnas pas bcu gnyis par 'gyur mi rnams bgrod pa dag kyang bcu gnyis rtsibs kyis la'o //
translated: The sun is in Virgo in the tenth part, in Libra in the eleventh, in Scorpio in the twelfth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Sagittarius in the thirteenth part, in Capricorn in the fourteenth, in Aquarius in the fifteenth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Pisces in the sixteenth part, in Aries in the seventeenth, in Taurus in the eighteenth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Gemini in the nineteenth part, in Cancer in the twentieth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Cancer when it is in Leo, in the eighth part of the earth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Virgo in the tenth part, in Libra in the eleventh, in Scorpio in the twelfth.

original: de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gis ka rka ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o /
analyzed: de bzhin lhor bgrod du 'gyur nyi ma bgrod pa'i dbang gis ka rka ta sogs khyim rnams dag la'o /
translated: The sun is in Sagittarius in the thirteenth part, in Capricorn in the fourteenth, in Aquarius in the fifteenth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Pisces in the sixteenth part, in Aries in the seventeenth, in Taurus in the eighteenth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Gemini in the nineteenth part, in Cancer in the twentieth.

original: 57 / steng du drug dang klu yi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar //ğŸ”½de nas g-yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs //
analyzed: 57 / steng du drug dang klu yi grangs ni nyi ma'i gdung byed dag kyang byang du bgrod pa dag gi mthar // de nas g-yas phyogs su yang zad par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po stong phrag dag ni drag po'i grangs //
translated: The sun is in Cancer when it is in Leo, in the eighth part of the earth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Virgo in the tenth part, in Libra in the eleventh, in Scorpio in the twelfth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Sagittarius in the thirteenth part, in Capricorn in the fourteenth, in Aquarius in the fifteenth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Pisces in the sixteenth part, in Aries in the seventeenth, in Taurus in the eighteenth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Gemini in the nineteenth part, in Cancer in the twentieth.

original: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas go la'i ri mo ste //
analyzed: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig mda' ni brgya dang bral bar gyur pa dbus nas go la'i ri mo ste //
translated: The sun is in Cancer when it is in Leo, in the eighth part of the earth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Virgo in the tenth part, in Libra in the eleventh, in Scorpio in the twelfth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Sagittarius in the thirteenth part, in Capricorn in the fourteenth, in Aquarius in the fifteenth.ğŸ”½The sun is in Pisces in the sixteenth part, in Aries in the seventeenth, in Taurus in the eighteenth.

original: de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo /
analyzed: de las gang zhig 'phel dang 'grib par 'gyur ba mkha' mkha' mda' dang mda' ni byang dang lhor yang ngo /
translated: The sun and moon move in the sky, the sun to the south in the northern hemisphere, the moon to the north in the southern hemisphere.

original: 58 / lan tshva'i rgya mtsho 'gongs nas nyin mor byed  pa dag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed //
analyzed: 58 / lan tshva'i rgya mtsho 'gongs nas nyin mor byed  pa dag ni lho ru me yi bar du 'gro bar byed //
translated: The sun moves to the south of the salt ocean for six months, and to the north for six months.

original: kee la sha yi byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ril  byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: kee la sha yi byang du 'gro ste gangs kyi ril  byang du yang ni byang la gnas pa'o //
translated: The sun moves to the north of Kailash in the northern hemisphere, and to the south of the snowy mountains in the southern hemisphere.

original: mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag la 'gro bar byed //
analyzed: mda' rnams tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni phyogs kyis bgrod pa dag la 'gro bar byed //
translated: The sun and moon move through the sky in the directions, traveling one thousand yojanas each day, as calculated by the lunar mansions.

original: phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin las 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag dag las so /
analyzed: phyed bcas mig klu zlas thob nyin dang nyin las 'dor ba lnga dang sa 'dzin stong phrag dag las so /
translated: They move half a degree each day, five degrees in one day and night, and one thousand yojanas.

original: 59 / khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed //
analyzed: 59 / khyim gcig la ni nyi ma gnas pas mtha' dag dus kyi tshogs dang zla ba dang ni phyogs rnams byed //
translated: The sun in one sign makes the entire zodiac, the moon the lunar mansions, and the planets the directions.

analyzed: dum bu dum bu dag tu zla bar 'gyur te sa gzhi bcu gnyis rtsibs rnams la ni rim pas so //
translated: The moon moves in parts of the zodiac, twelve degrees in each sign, in sequence.

original: tshad gang dum bu gang du nyin mo'i dbang gis yin pa de ni bdun pa dag tu mtshan mo la'o //ğŸ”½lam phyed 'bum phrag gsum po dag la nyi ma'i mdun du nyin mo dang ni rgyab tu mtshan mo'o /

translated: The day lengthens by one muhÅ«rta when the sun moves north for one yojana.ğŸ”½The night lengthens by one muhÅ«rta when the sun moves south for one yojana.ğŸ”½The sun moves north for three hundred thousand yojanas, and the day lengthens by one muhÅ«rta for every three yojanas.

original: 60 / ri yi rgyal po dag ni skye bo thams cad kyi yang byang na gnas par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag / nyi ma 'char ba shar du 'gyur te ri dang mnyam pa bgrod pa dag dang de ni nub pa nub //ğŸ”½dus dang thun mtshams @8a * //

translated: The sun moves south for three hundred thousand yojanas, and the night lengthens by one muhÅ«rta for every three yojanas.ğŸ”½The sun moves north of Meru for six months, and the day lengthens in the northern hemisphere.

original: bzhi dang thun tshod nyin dang mtshan mo dus kun tu ni yang dag rgyu ba rnams //ğŸ”½dus sbyor dbye bas phye bar gyur pa lhun po'i phyogs rnams su ni rab gsal nyi ma'i sa la 'khor /

original: 61 / chu tshod dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste //
analyzed: 61 / chu tshod dus la dpag tshad stong phrag drug ni rkang pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa 'gro ba ste //
translated: The sun moves north of Meru for six months, and the day lengthens in the northern hemisphere.ğŸ”½The sun moves south of Meru for six months, and the night lengthens in the northern hemisphere.ğŸ”½The sun moves north of Meru for six months, and the day lengthens in the southern hemisphere.ğŸ”½The sun moves south of Meru for six months, and the night lengthens in the southern hemisphere.

original: drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor //
analyzed: drug cu la ni me 'bum dag dang lnga dang ri bo'i stong phrag nyin dang mtshan mo dag tu 'khor //
translated: In sixty, five plus ten thousand fires, in day and night, in the zodiacs.

original: nyin dang mtshan mor go la phyed la mkha' me chu tshod bgrod de go la dag la g-yas dang ni //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mor go la phyed la mkha' me chu tshod bgrod de go la dag la g-yas dang ni //
translated: In half a day and night, the zodiacs move in the sky, five fingers, in the east and west, in the increase and decrease.

original: g-yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum /
analyzed: g-yas min dag tu 'grib dang 'phel ba lnga ste nyin zhag so sor de ni dbugs zung chu srang gsum /

original: 62 / lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur //
analyzed: 62 / lug gi dus sbyor la ni chu srang du 'gyur mkha' dgu lag ste mkha' dus mig ni glang la 'gyur //
translated: In the Aries configuration, nine fingers of space, in the Taurus configuration, two eyes of space.

original: zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mda' ro'i chu tshod du 'gyur ku l'i ra dang seng ge la'o //
analyzed: zung dag la yang mkha' mkha' gnyis te mda' ro'i chu tshod du 'gyur ku l'i ra dang seng ge la'o //
translated: In the Gemini configuration, two fingers of space, two fingers of space, in the Cancer configuration.

original: bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste nges par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur //
analyzed: bu mo la ni phyed bcas drug ste nges par srang sogs rim pa min pas de bzhin thams cad 'gyur //
translated: In the Leo configuration, six plus half, in the Virgo configuration, four plus half, in the Libra configuration, five plus half.ğŸ”½In the Scorpio configuration, three plus half, in the Sagittarius configuration, seven plus half, in the Capricorn configuration, eight plus half.ğŸ”½In the Aquarius configuration, nine plus half, in the Pisces configuration, ten plus half, in all, definitely not in order, finger lengths, etc.

original: dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char  bdag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skar dbye bas so /
analyzed: dus sbyor drug gis de nub gang phyir 'char  bdag kyang de bzhin nyi ma'i rgyu skar dbye bas so /
translated: In the six configurations, the sun sets, because it rises in the other six.

original: 63 / stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan pa dag las so yi cha yis nges par phyung gyur pa //
analyzed: 63 / stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya ldan pa dag las so yi cha yis nges par phyung gyur pa //

analyzed: lus la dbugs lhag gang dag nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung ba ri dang dus rnams dag gi grangs //

analyzed: stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyang lo brgya'i tshad du rab tu grags pa ste //

analyzed: 64 / zla ba'i phyogs te nyi ma'i bgrod pa dag dang sa skyes zla ba dgu rnams dag gis mtshan mo'o //

analyzed: bla ma'i lo drug tu 'gyur pa sangs kyi yang bgrod par 'gyur te zla skyes kyi yang bgrod pa'o //

translated: [The hours] of Venus and Mercury are combined into one, and are the hours of Mars and Jupiter.

original: 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi'o /ğŸ”½74 / zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu tshod drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te //
analyzed: 'di dag zla ba gsum gyis lo yi nyin zhag bu lon chu tshod longs spyod 'di ni gsum gyi'o / 74 / zla bar bla ma'i longs spyod du 'gyur rab gsal chu tshod drag po'i grangs ni rkang pa dang bcas te //
translated: These three [planets] have three hundred years in days, and the world-hours are the debt.ğŸ”½The hours of the moon are the hours of the ascendant, and the hours of the sun are the hours of the sun.

original: chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu tshod dag ni nyi ma'i bu yi longs spyod do //
analyzed: chu srang sum cu rnams dang gsal bar dus kyi chu tshod dag ni nyi ma'i bu yi longs spyod do //
translated: Thirty minutes are one hour, and the hours of the day are the hours of the sun's son.

original: gcig tu gyur pa nyin zhag ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas //
analyzed: gcig tu gyur pa nyin zhag ces bya gsum gyis bsgyur ba de yang zla ba phyed bcas mtshan mor bcas //
translated: One day is the sum of these, multiplied by three, and that is half a month with the night.

original: gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyin zhag rnams kyi nyin bzhin bu lon gza' @9b drug gi yang longs spyod do /
analyzed: gtso bo'i longs spyod la ni nyin zhag rnams kyi nyin bzhin bu lon gza' @9b drug gi yang longs spyod do /
translated: The days of the primary hours are the debt of the days, and the hours of the six planets are the hours of the six planets.

original: 75 / zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal ba'i las la khyab bdag rjes su gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyod //
analyzed: 75 / zla gcig lhag pa gang zhig dal ba'i las la khyab bdag rjes su gza' rnams kyis ni longs ma spyod //
translated: The lord of the month, the moon, is not enjoyed by the planets for more than a month, in slow motion.

original: de las rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod de //
analyzed: de las rab tu gsal bar phyed bcas bdun gyi chu tshod dag ni zla ba 'di nyid la spyod de //
translated: In this very month, it is enjoyed for seven and a half hours, divided into clear and unclear parts.

original: sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman //
analyzed: sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod nyi ma dang bcas zla ba'i rkang pa chu tshod phyed kyis rnam par dman //
translated: RÄhu enjoys the moon, together with the sun, for half a lunar hour, diminishing the lunar mansions.

original: nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zla ba'i chu tshod lnga /
analyzed: nyi ma'i bgrod pa dang po la gsum zla ba myos byed nyin zhag dag la zla ba'i chu tshod lnga /
translated: In the first solar revolution, three lunar hours, five lunar hours in the day, and the moon not enjoyed for half a lunar hour, is the lunar day.

original: 76 / gang zhig ma spyad phyed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus la cha dman zla ba ste //
analyzed: 76 / gang zhig ma spyad phyed kyi chu tshod de ni dus kyi nyin zhag dus la cha dman zla ba ste //
translated: That is the solar revolution, diminished by a lunar hour in the time of the day.

original: de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te nges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin zhag de'o //
analyzed: de ni nyi ma'i lhag par 'gyur te nges par dus kyis bsgyur ba nyi ma'i zla bar nyin zhag de'o //
translated: That is the solar month, the solar day of the revolution, definitely changed by time.

original: sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pa las //
analyzed: sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod mig gis rnam par bsgyur te phyogs kyi longs spyod dag gis bgos pa las //
translated: RÄhu enjoys the moon, transformed by the eye, divided by the enjoyments of the directions.

original: thob pa dag ni mjug rings chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod las /ğŸ”½77 / chu srang bdun dang phyed phrogs nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: thob pa dag ni mjug rings chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su sgra gcan zla ba'i longs spyod las / 77 / chu srang bdun dang phyed phrogs nges par yon tan gyis bsgyur nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la sbyang bar bya //
translated: The degrees of the ecliptic, the hours, the days, and the moments are subtracted from the moonâ€™s degrees of longitude,ğŸ”½and the remainder is multiplied by the moonâ€™s degrees of latitude. The result is divided by 59.5, and the quotient is added to the sunâ€™s degrees of longitude.

original: mjug rings nyi ma dag dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgyab nas so //
analyzed: mjug rings nyi ma dag dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu ste myur 'khyog dag la mdun dang rgyab nas so //
translated: The degrees of the ecliptic move together with the sun. They are in front of or behind the sun according to whether they are in the northern or southern direction.

original: rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyin dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod dag las rim pa ste //
analyzed: rgyu bar chu srang phyed bcas gnyis spyod nyin dang nyin la nyi ma'i longs spyod dag las rim pa ste //
translated: The degrees of the ecliptic move two degrees and a half in one day, in the forward or reverse direction, in relation to the sunâ€™s degrees of longitude.

original: rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis de rgyun  chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur /
analyzed: rang gi zla ba sum cu drug gis de rgyun  chu tshod dag kyang 'jig rten gyis ni tshes grangs bsgyur /
translated: The moonâ€™s degrees of longitude are multiplied by thirty-six. The result is divided by the moonâ€™s degrees of latitude. The quotient is the moonâ€™s hours. The worldâ€™s days are added to this.

original: 78 / phyed bcas zla bar chu tshad gnyis ni nyin zhags so sor 'char te myur 'khyog dag la mdun rgyab tu'o //
analyzed: 78 / phyed bcas zla bar chu tshad gnyis ni nyin zhags so sor 'char te myur 'khyog dag la mdun rgyab tu'o //
translated: The moonâ€™s degrees of latitude are multiplied by two. The result is divided by the moonâ€™s degrees of longitude. The quotient is the moonâ€™s degrees of longitude that rise in the forward or reverse direction in one day.

original: phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag tu ni de yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: phyed bcas zla ba'i bar dag tu ni de yi 'char ba mi yi 'jig rten dag tu mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: For half a month and more, its rising is seen in the world of men.

original: slar yang dpal dus 'khor lor rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi longs spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: slar yang dpal dus 'khor lor rab 'jug de ni gang tshe lo yi longs spyod dag la mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: Again, when it enters the glorious KÄlacakra, it is not seen in the enjoyment of the year.

original: de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur /
analyzed: de yi 'char ba'i cha dag shes par gyur na de yi 'char ba mtha' yas dus kyang shes par 'gyur /
translated: When its rising portion is known, its endless rising time is known.

original: 79 / lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mdas bsnun bgrod pa'i nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman //
analyzed: 79 / lo yi nyin zhag lnga yis bsgyur te slar yang mdas bsnun bgrod pa'i nyin zhag dag gis rab tu dman //

analyzed: phyi nas de dag rnams ni dag par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po skye ba'i rgyu skar rgyu ba las //
translated: Later, they are purified, O lord of men, by the movement of the lunar mansions, the causes of birth.

original: dma' ba rang gi yan lag dag las dag 'gyur bgrod pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so /
analyzed: dma' ba rang gi yan lag dag las dag 'gyur bgrod pa'i dbang gis mthon po nyi ma'i dbus gnas so /
translated: The moon, low in its own limb, is purified; by the power of its motion, it is high, in the middle of the sun.

original: 82 / zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis //
analyzed: 82 / zla ba drug gis zla ba'i longs spyod bsgyur ba las kyang dus kyi 'khor lo'i lo yi zla ba yis //
translated: In six months, the moon changes its lunar mansion and its year, and the year of the Kalachakra is also by the months of the moon.

original: cha thob dag kyang bu lon du 'gyur nyi ma ri bong can gyi rjes su ma spyad chu tshod phyed ;
analyzed: cha thob dag kyang bu lon du 'gyur nyi ma ri bong can gyi rjes su ma spyad chu tshod phyed ;
translated: The lunar days are also debts; the sun does not follow the hare-holder; the half-hour is also.

original: / slar yang mjug rings kyi ni gang zhig lhag pa nyin zhag so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur //
analyzed: / slar yang mjug rings kyi ni gang zhig lhag pa nyin zhag so so'i dus su zla ba'i nyin gyis bsgyur //
translated: Again, whatever remains of the comet is in each day and night, multiplied by the lunar days of the moon.

original: drug cu'i cha yis chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba dag la yang /
analyzed: drug cu'i cha yis chu tshod nyin zhag so so'i dus su myur dang 'khyog por 'char ba dag la yang /
translated: The hours are by the sixty-minute degrees, in each day and night, in the swift and oblique ascendants.

original: 83 / zla skyes blon po myur  bdag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te sa skyes mjug rings 'khyog po la //
analyzed: 83 / zla skyes blon po myur  bdag la stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te sa skyes mjug rings 'khyog po la //
translated: The moon-born minister, the swift one, becomes powerful; the earth-born comet is oblique.

original: dman pa pa sangs dal ba la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med //
analyzed: dman pa pa sangs dal ba la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rgyu ba lhag ma la stobs med //
translated: The slow one moves to the west, the fast one to the east, and the middling one to the south.

original: 85 / tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang //
analyzed: 85 / tshigs mtshams su ni ri bong can gyi dkyil 'khor dag la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug ste dkyil 'khor yang //
translated: At the nodes, RÄhu enters the lunar orb and obscures it.

original: rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin te ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu'o //
analyzed: rnam dag gyur na thams cad 'dzin te ri bong ldan pa'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor chu tshod drug cu'o //
translated: When the nodes are pure, he seizes the whole moon; by the power of the moon, the lunar mansions are sixty hours.

original: phyed dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste //
analyzed: phyed dag gyur na phyed 'dzin ri bong can gyi dbang gis chu tshod dag ni ji snyed yod pa ste //
translated: When the nodes are half pure, he seizes half the moon; by the power of the moon, the hours are as many as there are lunar mansions.

original: gnag dang dkar ba'i tshigs mtshams dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin /
analyzed: gnag dang dkar ba'i tshigs mtshams dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'dzin /
translated: At the nodes of the dark and bright fortnights, the sun and moon are seized in the daytime and nighttime, respectively.

original: 86 / mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams dag gi lo yi longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya //
analyzed: 86 / mi rnams kyi ni lo brgya dag kyang gza' rnams dag gi lo yi longs spyod kyis ni bsgyur bar bya //
translated: The years of humans are converted into the years of the planets by the enjoyment of the planets.

original: gnas gnyis phyogs kyi chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: gnas gnyis phyogs kyi chas thob de ni bu lon du 'gyur steng gi phung po dag la sbyang bar bya //
translated: The two places are obtained by the parts of the directions; that is a debt. It should be subtracted from the upper aggregate.

original: 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la'o /
analyzed: 'bum phrag nyi shu gcig dang khri phrag drug gi lo grangs gang dag rnams ni dus kyi phyed la'o /
translated: The years are twenty-one hundred thousand and sixty thousand for half the eon.

original: slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs dag tu ni rab tu 'gyur /
analyzed: slar yang phung po gnyis kyis nges par bzhi po rnams kyi lo yi grangs dag tu ni rab tu 'gyur /
translated: Again, the two sets of four are the number of years.

original: 87 / stong pa stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad //
analyzed: 87 / stong pa stong pa nam mkha' klu dang lag pa thub pa ri bong can rnams rdzogs ldan dus kyi tshad //
translated: The empty, the empty, space, the naga, the hand, the sage, and the rabbit are the measure of the Satya Yuga.

original: gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags //
analyzed: gsum ldan la ni nam mkha' mkha' stong ro dang dgu dang nyin byed lo yi grangs su rab tu grags //
translated: Space, the empty, the thousand, the nine, and the sun are well known as the number of years of the Treta Yuga.

original: stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag ste //
analyzed: stong pa stong pa mkha' dang rig byed ro dang lag 'gro zhes pa gnyis ldan lor ni yang dag ste //
translated: The empty, the empty, space, the Veda, the nine, and the hand are the perfect number of years of the Dvapara Yuga.

original: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mig yon tan chu gter rnams kyi lo yi grangs ni rtsod pa'i dus la 'gyur /
translated: The empty, space, the eye, the quality, and the ocean are the number of years of the Kali Yuga.

original: 88 / lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas //
analyzed: 88 / lo ni 'di dag rnams kyis dus kyi mtha' ru gza' tshogs rgyu ba khyim ni stong pa dag la gnas //
translated: At the end of the eon, the planets move through the empty houses.

translated: Again, the AÅ›vinÄ« and so forth, the lunar mansions, the months beginning with KÄrtika, the planets, the conjunctions, the lunar days, and the activities, are the first.ğŸ”½At that time, there will be a fierce battle between the gods and the asuras on the surface of the earth.ğŸ”½The six groups, together with the solar tones, are definitely transformed by the qualities in three years and days.ğŸ”½The short vowels beginning with a.ğŸ”½
