translated: All the buddhas and bodhisattvas in all directions, free from faults, together with their queens,

original: de dag rnams kyis mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur slad du bdag la bskyang du gsol //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyis mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur slad du bdag la bskyang du gsol //
translated: may they protect me with supreme compassion for the sake of conferring empowerment in the mandala.

original: de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas seng ldeng rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab //
analyzed: de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas seng ldeng rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab //
translated: Having made this supplication to all of them, one should drive in the pegs made of ká¹›tamÄla wood with the mantra of the earth goddess.

original: phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa rnams ni phyogs kyi cha ru bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya /
analyzed: phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan pa rnams ni phyogs kyi cha ru bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya /
translated: The wrathful ones of the directions, holding weapons, should be placed in the directional sectors for the purpose of protection.

original: 27 / zug rngu sol ba dang bcas rva ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed sa yi snying por nges par zhugs gyur na //
analyzed: 27 / zug rngu sol ba dang bcas rva ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed sa yi snying por nges par zhugs gyur na //
translated: The arrow with charcoal, the horn of death, having definitely entered the heart of the earth,

original: gnas de dag tu yon tan dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur te de yi phyir na sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: gnas de dag tu yon tan dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur te de yi phyir na sbyang bar bya //
translated: In these places, the qualities are diminished by the power of the site. Therefore, it should be purified.

original: sa la rin chen dud  dang mching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste //
analyzed: sa la rin chen dud  dang mching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gi don du ste //
translated: For the sake of the mandala of the Victorious One, the jewel and the glass are placed on the ground.

original: khang  bzangs  don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyin la sogs slad du'o /
analyzed: khang  bzangs  don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges par 'dir ni mchod sbyin la sogs slad du'o /
translated: For the sake of the palace, the house, and the light, the sacrifice, and so forth, are definitely performed here.

original: 28 / rdzogs pa dag la  sa ni sbyang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu //
analyzed: 28 / rdzogs pa dag la  sa ni sbyang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag ni yang dag bsdu //
translated: The ground is purified for the perfect ones, and so too is the earth to be seized and the sons to be gathered.

original: bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab 'dod pa ma nu'i nyin zhag dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid //
translated: On the twelfth, the desire to lay out the lines, on the day of Manushi, the glorious colored powders are spread.

original: dbang la sogs pa nyal mchog gi bla mas sbyin te bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang //
analyzed: dbang la sogs pa nyal mchog gi bla mas sbyin te bdud ni bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang //
translated: The initiations, and so forth, are given by the guru of supreme practice, and on the day of the destruction of Mara,

original: de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas @40a * //
analyzed: de yi mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rigs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas @40a * //
translated: on that night, one will abide in the royal family, and on another night, one will abide in the highest.

original: min / 29 / dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: min / 29 / dag pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
translated: The lord of men, in the pure conjunctions, under the influence of the planets, etc., is well situated on other nights.

original: srog dang pa sangs nub par gyur na de tshe nges par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog dang pa sangs nub par gyur na de tshe nges par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When the life and the Venus have set, then the bride is not well situated.

original: slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ba dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni //
analyzed: slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ba dag kyang mtha' dag shes nas ni //
translated: The teacher, having known all the mundane and supramundane matters on the ground,

original: bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur /ğŸ”½30 / slob ma'i mgo bo snying ga de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin ba dpal ldan gsang ba'i padmar ni //
analyzed: bya ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu sbyin par 'gyur / 30 / slob ma'i mgo bo snying ga de bzhin gtsug tor lte ba mgrin ba dpal ldan gsang ba'i padmar ni //
translated: whatever he does, that he does completely, and thus the results are well bestowed.

original: rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis bsrung byas shing //
analyzed: rgyal ba la sogs gnyi ga'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis phye ba dag gis bsrung byas shing //
translated: The head, heart, crown, navel, throat, and the glorious secret lotus of the disciple are protected by the two families of the Victorious One, divided into body, speech, and mind.

original: de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te //
analyzed: de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rab gsal nges pa'i dpal ldan dbyangs rnams dag gis te //
translated: Likewise, the images, etc., and the books are protected by the glorious vowels, which are well known.

original: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid /
analyzed: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du che ge bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhengs par bgyid /
translated: For the sake of the liberation of sentient beings, I will erect the mandala of the principal deity.

original: 31 / dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin tu mnyam par bkod pa rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag khru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong phrag dag gi tshad la ni //
analyzed: 31 / dag pa'i gnas ni legs par gang zhing shin tu mnyam par bkod pa rus sbal rgyab bzhin mtho ba dag khru tshad gcig la sogs pa dus dang nor dang mi bdag de bzhin stong phrag dag gi tshad la ni //
translated: In a pure place, well-filled, and very evenly arranged, as high as the back of a tortoise, one cubit in size, and so on, the measure of time, wealth, and the lord of men, likewise, in the measure of a thousand,

original: thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang gshin rje chu bdag tu ste byang du rdo rje dril bu dag / bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang po dang ni phyi ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya /
analyzed: thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon lha dang gshin rje chu bdag tu ste byang du rdo rje dril bu dag / bkod nas mtshan ma rnyed na dang po dang ni phyi ma'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya /
translated: having arranged the thread, the vajra, the colored powders, the deities, Yama, and Varuna in the north, the vajra and the bell, having found the signs, one should lay out the mandala thread in the first and last directions.

original: 32 / thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: 32 / thig skud chad par gyur na bla ma nyams shing yongs 'joms 'gongs par gyur na bu rnams dag kyang ngo //
translated: If the thread breaks, the guru is impaired; if it is too long, the children are also.

original: gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang //
analyzed: gal te rdul tshon rlung gis khyer na 'jigs pa gsal byed yul 'khor dag tu rgyal po 'jigs pa yang //
translated: If the colored powder is carried away by the wind, there is danger; if it is scattered in the realm, the king is in danger.

original: mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas slar yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: mtshan ma ngan pa de dag mthong nas slar yang gtso bo dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
translated: Having seen these bad signs, one should again perform the recitation of the principal mantra.

original: slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: slar yang mtshan ma rnyed na mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang pa dag gis thig ni gdab pa bsgrub par bya /
translated: If one again finds the signs, one should perform the laying out of the lines with even and uneven steps.

original: 33 / shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'joms su gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya //
analyzed: 33 / shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus su yongs 'joms su gyur de ni dkyil 'khor dag la spang bar bya //
translated: The limb of wisdom and means, the total conquest, should be abandoned in the maá¹‡á¸ala.

original: sa la g-yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin //
analyzed: sa la g-yul gyi dus su rtse mo can dang rlung du gnas pa'i sde yi dbus su gdengs can bzhin //
translated: In the earth battle, in the middle of the crest and wind troops, like the hooded nÄgas,

original: g-yul du sde ni nyams par 'gyur te sa gzhi dag tu mtshan ma'i 'thab mo la ni @40b bsnun pa'o //
analyzed: g-yul du sde ni nyams par 'gyur te sa gzhi dag tu mtshan ma'i 'thab mo la ni @40b bsnun pa'o //
translated: the army is defeated in the battle, and the signs are struck down on the ground.

original: de phyir g-yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya /
analyzed: de phyir g-yul dang dbang dag la yang yongs 'joms shin tu stobs dang ldan par sngags pas rig par bya /
translated: Therefore, in battles and subjugations, the total conquest is very powerful, the mantra practitioner should know.

original: 34 / aa sogs ka sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying ga'i padmar zla nyi me steng du //
analyzed: 34 / aa sogs ka sogs rdo rje ldan pa dag gis rang gi snying ga'i padmar zla nyi me steng du //
translated: With the a and so forth, the ka and so forth, endowed with the vajra, in one's heart lotus, on the moon, sun, and fire,

original: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g-yas brkyang zhabs ni bsgoms byas shing //
analyzed: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo ri bong can 'dzin 'dod pa mnan pa'i g-yas brkyang zhabs ni bsgoms byas shing //
translated: One should meditate on the glorious Wheel of Time, with his right leg extended, pressing down on the one who desires the one with the rabbit-bearing moon.

original: shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i padma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
analyzed: shes rab gtso bo'i thugs ka'i padma nyi zla sbyar ldan la ste rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis //
translated: At the lotus of the heart of the one who is foremost in wisdom, with the sun and moon joined, with one's own vajra hook,

original: sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam bkod cing thig skud la yang bsgom par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam bkod cing thig skud la yang bsgom par bya /
translated: one should summon the buddhas and goddesses, and arrange them in the colored powders, and also meditate on the threads.

original: 35 / thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya //
analyzed: 35 / thig ni ro dang dgu bcu 'di dag tshangs pa'i thig las phyogs kyi cha rnams dag tu rab sbyin bya //
translated: The lines are the thirty-nine tastes, which are given in the directions from the line of BrahmÄ.

original: sor phyed brjed  pa nor dang dus kyi thig rnams dag gis dbus su snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: sor phyed brjed  pa nor dang dus kyi thig rnams dag gis dbus su snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The half-finger space and the lines of time make the central maá¹‡á¸ala.

original: snying po las ni phyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po sgo yi mtshams //
analyzed: snying po las ni phyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po sgo yi mtshams //
translated: From the center, all the external arrangements are in the great maá¹‡á¸ala, at the boundary of the gates.

original: ra ba rta babs la sogs rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la blta bar bya /
analyzed: ra ba rta babs la sogs rtse mo can dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa la blta bar bya /
translated: One should look at the outer maá¹‡á¸ala, with the walls, archways, and so on, on the ground.

original: 36 / gtso bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas su ni //
analyzed: 36 / gtso bo'i 'khor lo chu skyes lha la sogs pa'i gdan las sum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas su ni //
translated: The principal wheel, the seat of the lotus and so on, is tripled in the place of Brahma.

original: nyi ma'i re mig dag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyis ka ba rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nyi ma'i re mig dag gis 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyis ka ba rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur //
translated: It is transformed by the squares of the sun, and again by the moon, the vajra garland.

original: bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs padmar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyis phyi rol rdo rje phreng bar yang //
analyzed: bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs padmar rab 'gyur ri bong can gyis phyi rol rdo rje phreng bar yang //
translated: By four, it is transformed into the lotus of the Buddha and so on, and by the moon, the outer vajra garland.

original: lha mo sangs rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur /
analyzed: lha mo sangs rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa'am ni thod pa'i gdan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur /
translated: Between the goddesses and the Buddhas, there are three squares, the seat of the vase or skull.

original: 37 / gnas de nas 'dir ji srid re kh'a'i bar du nyin mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyi sar 'gyur te //
analyzed: 37 / gnas de nas 'dir ji srid re kh'a'i bar du nyin mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyi sar 'gyur te //
translated: From that place up to the lines, the squares are the color places of the sun.

original: phyogs zur rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dril sogs pa rnams kyis zla nyi padma nyid //
analyzed: phyogs zur rnams su chu gter re mig dag gis dril sogs pa rnams kyis zla nyi padma nyid //
translated: In the corners, by the squares of the oceans, there are the moon, sun, and lotus of the drum and so on.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis re kh'a gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang sgo khyud dang // de bzhin logs dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba phyed /
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig gis re kh'a gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang sgo khyud dang // de bzhin logs dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang ni kha khyer chen po dag dang ka ba phyed /
translated: The three doors and the door-jambs, the three walls and the three sides, the great ledges and the half-pillars,

original: 38 / de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni do shal sa ru 'gyur //
analyzed: 38 / de nas phyed dang gnyis dang dus kyi nor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang ni do shal sa ru 'gyur //
translated: are by the three, time and taste. Then the half-plus-one, the three-times-three, the half-plus-two, and the time-jewel nature, are the ledges and the garland.

original: sgo yi rtsa ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur //
analyzed: sgo yi rtsa ba'i dang po nas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur //
translated: The three-times-ten, from the first of the door-roots, is the pediment with pillars.

original: thig phyed steng du dor nas do shal phyed pa dag gi mthar @41a * //
analyzed: thig phyed steng du dor nas do shal phyed pa dag gi mthar @41a * //
translated: Having cast off the half-thread above, the half-garland is at the end.

original: ni ba ku l'ir yang rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: ni ba ku l'ir yang rab tu 'gyur //
translated: Then, the baka is also.

original: re mig drug gis rta babs 'og tu nor gyi padma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams snam bu'o /
analyzed: re mig drug gis rta babs 'og tu nor gyi padma dang ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams snam bu'o /
translated: The six squares below the pediment, with the jewel-lotus, are the ledges of the yoginis.

original: 39 / de nas ro yis bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal ldan tshon gyi sa ste re kh'a lnga yi bar du'o //
analyzed: 39 / de nas ro yis bsgyur ba'i dus kyis dpal ldan tshon gyi sa ste re kh'a lnga yi bar du'o //
translated: Then, the glorious color-ground is by the time-taste-converted, up to the five threads.

original: phyogs zur rnams su nyi ma'i padma nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan nyi ma'i re mig dag gis bya //
analyzed: phyogs zur rnams su nyi ma'i padma nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan nyi ma'i re mig dag gis bya //
translated: In the corners, double the sun lotuses, with the sun squares having the petals of the moon.

original: snying po'i sgo ni nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi yon tan dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo dag kyang //
analyzed: snying po'i sgo ni nyis 'gyur rnam pa gsum gyi yon tan dbang gis 'dir ni phyi rol sgo dag kyang //
translated: The door of the center is double, and the outer doors are also here, by the power of the three qualities.

original: ra ba sogs dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyis rab tu bya /
analyzed: ra ba sogs dang de bzhin nyid du dkyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyis rab tu bya /
translated: The enclosure and so forth, and likewise the three mandalas, are set out with the three eights.

original: 40 / de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba yang //
analyzed: 40 / de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang ni phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba yang //
translated: At the beginning and end of those, the sun and moon mandalas and the outer vajra garland

original: de phyed re mig dag gis bya ste 'khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mthar yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: de phyed re mig dag gis bya ste 'khor lo gang yin dkyil 'khor mthar yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la //
translated: are made with the half squares. The wheel is also at the end of the mandala, in the center of the wind mandala.

original: ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni ;
analyzed: ka ba'i 'og tu gdengs can rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rta ni ;
translated: Below the pillars, there is also the mandala of the nÄgas. The gods' chariot

original: / nyi ma dag gis sgo yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la shar gyi cha dang nub la yang /
analyzed: / nyi ma dag gis sgo yi dbus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la shar gyi cha dang nub la yang /
translated: is in the middle of the door of the sun, in the sky and on the ground, in the east and west.

original: 41 / rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang ma ra ka ta byi ru mu tig la sogs dang //  dbyi ba lnga yi 'bru'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dag gis //
analyzed: 41 / rdo rje la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dang ma ra ka ta byi ru mu tig la sogs dang //  dbyi ba lnga yi 'bru'am rnam mang nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa'i tshon dag gis //
translated: 41. With the five jewels, diamond, etc., with gold, with ruby, coral, pearl, etc., with the five kinds of grain, with many kinds of gems, and with colored threads in the same way,

original: phyogs kyi cha la tshon gyi sar ni mi yi bdag po sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyogs kyi cha la tshon gyi sar ni mi yi bdag po sangs rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab par 'gyur //
translated: the lord of men, by the division of the Buddhas, will scatter the colored powders on the colored cloth in the directions.

original: ser dang dkar dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rim pas so /ğŸ”½42 / shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyi ma mtshungs pa dag ste nub tu yang //
analyzed: ser dang dkar dang dmar ba sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang ni me rlung dag la rim pas so / 42 / shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyi ma mtshungs pa dag ste nub tu yang //
translated: With yellow, white, red, etc., on the circles of earth and water, and on fire and wind, respectively.ğŸ”½In the east, the glorious one is black; in the south, he is like the sun; in the west, he is golden; in the north, he is like the moon.

original: gser mdog byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: gser mdog byang du gzhan te ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye bas so //
translated: In the east, the glorious one is black; in the south, he is like the sun; in the west, he is golden; in the north, he is like the moon.

original: dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i snam bu dang ni do shal dag gis //
analyzed: dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i snam bu dang ni do shal dag gis //
translated: With white, red, and black, respectively, arranged in order, with the bands and the necklaces,

original: padma zla nyi'i kha dog gis te dri med ri bong can mtshungs dmar dang nag pa'i ri mo gsum /
analyzed: padma zla nyi'i kha dog gis te dri med ri bong can mtshungs dmar dang nag pa'i ri mo gsum /
translated: The lotus is the color of the moon and sun, with three stainless lines, white, black, and red, like the moon.

original: 43 / dbus su padma 'dab brgyad ljang gu dag ste bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 43 / dbus su padma 'dab brgyad ljang gu dag ste bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur //
translated: In the center are eight green lotus petals, and the vajra garland is like a bee.

original: dbang ldan lha min me rlung dag tu zla ba nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yis //
analyzed: dbang ldan lha min me rlung dag tu zla ba nyi ma'i lus dang nag po ser po rim pa yis //
translated: In the northeast, southwest, southeast, and northwest are the moon, sun, body, black, and yellow, in order.

original: dung dang ga nd'i nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bya de bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyad du //
analyzed: dung dang ga nd'i nor bu dag dang ljon pa zhes bya de bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyad du //
translated: The conch, the jewel of the gandharva tree, and the white vase are in the eight intermediate directions.

original: zla @41b ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed padma dkar po'i steng du yang /
analyzed: zla @41b ba chu skyes dmar po'i steng du rab tu 'gyur te nyin byed padma dkar po'i steng du yang /
translated: On the moon and the red lotus, and on the sun and the white lotus,

original: 44 / chu skyes dmar po'i lte ba la ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dag gi gdan du 'gyur //
analyzed: 44 / chu skyes dmar po'i lte ba la ni lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dag gi gdan du 'gyur //
translated: the seats of the goddesses are in the center of the red lotus and the moon.

original: chu skyes dkar po'i lte  ba dag la lha rnams kyi yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su'o //
analyzed: chu skyes dkar po'i lte  ba dag la lha rnams kyi yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su'o //
translated: On the center of the white lotus and the sun, the gods also have the sun, in the directions.

original: phyi rol tu ni gtso bo'i padma'i dbang gis rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar //
analyzed: phyi rol tu ni gtso bo'i padma'i dbang gis rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar //
translated: Externally, by the power of the principal lotus, the vajra fence becomes white, the ledges are white,

original: ka ba ser po b'a ku li ni kha ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so /
analyzed: ka ba ser po b'a ku li ni kha ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so /
translated: the pillars are yellow, the eaves are the color of snow, and the archways are multicolored.

original: 45 / dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi nor gyi padma'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu //
analyzed: 45 / dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi nor gyi padma'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu //
translated: The platforms of the lotus of the yoginÄ«s are white in all directions.

original: phyogs kyi char ni padma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang gis padma dkar po zur du yang //
analyzed: phyogs kyi char ni padma dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang gis padma dkar po zur du yang //
translated: In the corners, by the power of the victors, the lotus is white, and in the intermediate directions, the lotus is red.

original: zla ba nyi mas rnam dman de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan no //
analyzed: zla ba nyi mas rnam dman de bzhin nyid du 'chi med rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan no //
translated: The moon and sun are diminished, and likewise, the lotuses of the immortals are doubled.

original: mkha' sogs re kh'a lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sum cha bar du gnas /
analyzed: mkha' sogs re kh'a lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sum cha bar du gnas /
translated: The five lines of space and so on are one-third of the way in by the power of the nature and qualities.

original: 46 / ka ba'i 'og gi sgo yi mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 46 / ka ba'i 'og gi sgo yi mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khor dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
translated: In the space below the pillars, at the junctions of the doors, the maá¹‡á¸alas of VÄyu and so on are fully formed.

original: dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur du sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag go mi yi dbang //
analyzed: dbang ldan dang ni lha min zur du sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag go mi yi dbang //
translated: The moon and sun, which are located in the middle of the mandala, are in the northeast and southwest, respectively.

original: phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dags dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi rol sgo yi steng gi char ni ri dags dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo sprin gyi mdog tu 'gyur //
translated: Above the outer door is the Dharma wheel, the color of clouds, with a deer.

original: g-yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas chur ni rnga bo che dang byang chub shing /
analyzed: g-yas su bum pa dmar por 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas chur ni rnga bo che dang byang chub shing /
translated: To the right is a red vase, and to the left is a treasure vase, both with a yaká¹£a.

original: 47 / dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phyang bar gyur pa dang // do shal phyed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo yi dbus su'o //
analyzed: 47 / dril bu me long ba dan ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rta babs dag las 'phyang bar gyur pa dang // do shal phyed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis shing rta sgo yi dbus su'o //
translated: In the center of the door is a chariot, the color of the family, with a half-garland.

original: 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol tu //
analyzed: 'khor lo dkar dang dmar po rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis rlung la sgo yi phyi rol tu //
translated: Outside the door is a white wheel, the color of the family, with a wind.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba dag tu'ang 'gyur /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis mi yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba dag tu'ang 'gyur /
translated: Outside the door is a blazing vajra, the color of the family, with a vajra garland.

original: 48 / sbom pas nad dag byed cing phra dang re kh'a ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed //
analyzed: 48 / sbom pas nad dag byed cing phra dang re kh'a ngan pas rdzas ni nyams pa rab tu gsal bar byed //
translated: The thick line makes clear the illness; the thin line and the bad color, the loss of substance.

original: chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de bzhin nyid du bskyod //
analyzed: chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de bzhin nyid du bskyod //
translated: The broken line, death; the crooked line, the king and the city in the same way.

original: mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med //
analyzed: mtshan ma nyi ma zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med //
translated: The broken sign of the sun and moon, the adepts have no power to destroy the fear of existence.

original: rnam par 'dres pas rigs rgyud 'chad de @42a * //
analyzed: rnam par 'dres pas rigs rgyud 'chad de @42a * //
translated: The mixed sign, the family is cut off.

original: rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya /
translated: The Victorious One has declared this in the mandala of colored powders.

original: 49 / gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur //
analyzed: 49 / gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rgyur //
translated: The sign not clearly stated in the Tantra, the Victorious One has declared it to be a cause of beauty.ğŸ”½It should not be placed in the mandala; it is the sign of Mara.

original: dkyil 'khor dag la dgod par mi bya de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la ni ;
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag la dgod par mi bya de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la ni ;
translated: In the family which produces the Victorious One,

original: / de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o //
analyzed: / de phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo yi mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o //
translated: Therefore, the signs taught in the tantras are as follows: By the power of the family, the mandala is drawn from the door threshold.

original: do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la padma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya /
analyzed: do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi la padma bum sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya /
translated: At the end of the half-garland, on the ground of the earth mandala, one should make beautiful lotus flowers, vases, and so forth.

original: 50 / nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang //
analyzed: 50 / nag po la sogs rkang pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag ni rdul tshon dpangs te nas gcig dag nas kyang //
translated: The height of the colored powders increases by one part, starting from one part.

original: rab rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyes re kh'a nyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab rnams ni sum 'gyur nyin mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyes re kh'a nyis 'gyur ro //
translated: For the best, it is three times, for the sun, moon, and lotus petals, it is double.

original: snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la ste //
analyzed: snying po dag las phyi rol dpangs ni nyis 'gyur du 'gyur mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la ste //
translated: Outside the essence, the height becomes double, O lord of men, for this mandala.

original: do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni nas gtsigs chu bsreg za rlung dang rdo rje phreng ba rnams la'o /
analyzed: do shal phyed pa'i mthar ni nas gtsigs chu bsreg za rlung dang rdo rje phreng ba rnams la'o /
translated: At the end of the half-garland, for the parts of the barley, water, fire, wind, and vajra garland.

original: 51 dbus nas sgo yi dang po'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar 'gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: 51 dbus nas sgo yi dang po'i mtshams ni nor gyi blo gros mar 'gyur 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la //
translated: From the center to the first door threshold, it becomes the wealth-granting wisdom, in the mandala of the world systems.

original: sgo nas tsa rtsi ka mthar sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis lan tshva'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur //
analyzed: sgo nas tsa rtsi ka mthar sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis lan tshva'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur //
translated: At the door, one should multiply by three and divide by four. The squares are the abode of the salt treasure.

original: de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang me yi dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur //
translated: Then, from the square of the lord of the victors, the fire maá¹‡á¸ala, in the same way, there is wind.

original: de yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas sa chu bsreg za rlung rnams blta bar bya /
analyzed: de yi phyi rol du ni de dag rnam par dag pas sa chu bsreg za rlung rnams blta bar bya /
translated: Outside of that, one should see the earth, water, fire, and wind, purified in that way.

original: 52 / gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor la ni sbyang bar bya //

original: thab tu sbyin sreg dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur te slar yang 'jug ngogs pa rnams spyan drang ba dag dang // dpal ldan sa la bsang ba dang ni mchod yon cho ga de bzhin bdud ni gzhom pa dag kyang ngo /
analyzed: thab tu sbyin sreg dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur te slar yang 'jug ngogs pa rnams spyan drang ba dag dang // dpal ldan sa la bsang ba dang ni mchod yon cho ga de bzhin bdud ni gzhom pa dag kyang ngo /
translated: and the sprinkling and the worship of the glorious earth, and likewise the subjugation of the demons.

original: 69 / sgo rnams bsrung ba'i don du brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan dag pa'i slob ma rnams ni rab dgod bya //ğŸ”½dpal @44a * //
analyzed: 69 / sgo rnams bsrung ba'i don du brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan dag pa'i slob ma rnams ni rab dgod bya // dpal @44a * //
translated: For the sake of guarding the doors, the pure disciples, endowed with the vow, should be placed.

original: ldan bum pa dag gi rnal 'byor ma rnams me dang lha min rlung dbang zur du rim pas so //
analyzed: ldan bum pa dag gi rnal 'byor ma rnams me dang lha min rlung dbang zur du rim pas so //
translated: The glorious vases of the yoginÄ«s are in the fire, the demigod, the wind, and the corner, respectively.

original: slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang por 'gyur te mi bdag las kyi rdo rje can dag rab byas nas //
analyzed: slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang por 'gyur te mi bdag las kyi rdo rje can dag rab byas nas //
translated: The glorious master becomes the lord of the gaá¹‡as, and the king is made the karma vajra.

original: slob ma med na tshogs kyi dbang po rang gis kyang ni sbyin sreg las la sogs pa dag kyang bya /
analyzed: slob ma med na tshogs kyi dbang po rang gis kyang ni sbyin sreg las la sogs pa dag kyang bya /
translated: If there are no disciples, the lord of the gaá¹‡a himself should also perform the fire sacrifice and so forth.

original: 70 / zlum po 'am ni rig byed zur dag rigs kyi dbang gis zhi dang rgyas pa dag gi thab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 70 / zlum po 'am ni rig byed zur dag rigs kyi dbang gis zhi dang rgyas pa dag gi thab tu 'gyur //
translated: The round or triangular hearth becomes the hearth for pacifying and enriching, respectively, by the power of the family.

original: byang ngam drag po'i zur dang gzhan yang dkar po'i sa la rtsa ba'i padma dag ni nyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang ngam drag po'i zur dang gzhan yang dkar po'i sa la rtsa ba'i padma dag ni nyis 'gyur ro //
translated: The root lotus is twice as large in the northern or wrathful corner and in the other white sectors.

original: zabs ni padma'i tshad du 'gyur te de yi nang du rtsa ba'i padma mtshan mar bcas pa'o //
analyzed: zabs ni padma'i tshad du 'gyur te de yi nang du rtsa ba'i padma mtshan mar bcas pa'o //
translated: The depth is the measure of the lotus. In its center is the root lotus with its sign.

original: padma phyed la padma'i phyi ru bum pa dang bcas ral gri rin chen sogs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur /
analyzed: padma phyed la padma'i phyi ru bum pa dang bcas ral gri rin chen sogs kyi mtshan mar 'gyur /
translated: Half of that is the outer lotus with its vase, sword, jewel, and so forth.

original: 71 / de yi phyed kyis kyang ni mchu ste de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang kha khyer dag gi brgya yi cha //
analyzed: 71 / de yi phyed kyis kyang ni mchu ste de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang kha khyer dag gi brgya yi cha //
translated: Half of that is the spout, and twice that is the width of the rim.

original: steng du rdo rje phreng ba dag kyang mchu yi phyed kyis dpangs dag tu ni nges par rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: steng du rdo rje phreng ba dag kyang mchu yi phyed kyis dpangs dag tu ni nges par rab tu 'gyur //
translated: Above, the vajra garland is definitely half the height of the spout.

original: phyi rol 'og tu padma'i 'dab ma rnams dang ku sha'i bkod pa phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu bya //
analyzed: phyi rol 'og tu padma'i 'dab ma rnams dang ku sha'i bkod pa phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu bya //
translated: Outside, below, the lotus petals and the array of kuÅ›a grass are in all directions.

original: de yi mthar ni nub phyogs dag tu nges par re kh'a gsum gyi sgo gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur /
analyzed: de yi mthar ni nub phyogs dag tu nges par re kh'a gsum gyi sgo gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur /
translated: At its end, in the west, there is definitely one door with three lines.

original: 72 / slob dpon dag gi gdan ni nges par mnyam par 'gyur te snying po'i padma dag las nyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 72 / slob dpon dag gi gdan ni nges par mnyam par 'gyur te snying po'i padma dag las nyis 'gyur ro //
translated: The seat of the master is certainly equal, twice the size of the lotus of the essence.

original: g-yon du mchod yon gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sbyin sreg snod dag gi yang g-yas su 'gyur //
analyzed: g-yon du mchod yon gdan du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sbyin sreg snod dag gi yang g-yas su 'gyur //
translated: The seat of the libation is on the left, and on the right of the lord of men is the sacrificial ladle.

original: kun gyi rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i yang na mkha' yi padma yum gyi'o //
analyzed: kun gyi rdo rje'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i yang na mkha' yi padma yum gyi'o //
translated: The sign of the vajra is on all, or of the lord of the victors, or of the mother in the sky lotus.

original: zhal dang gsang ba dag kyang thab khung rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te rgyal po phyi dang lus la'o /
analyzed: zhal dang gsang ba dag kyang thab khung rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te rgyal po phyi dang lus la'o /
translated: The face and the secret are the two types of hearth, the king outside and the body inside.

original: 73 / thab kyi phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la khro bo'i rgyal po lha mor bcas pas bsrung ba byas nas ni //
analyzed: 73 / thab kyi phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor dag la khro bo'i rgyal po lha mor bcas pas bsrung ba byas nas ni //
translated: Having protected the maá¹‡á¸ala of the ten directions of the hearth with the king of wrathful ones together with the goddesses,

original: dpal ldan rdo rje dag gis bsang ba sogs dang chur bcas me tog rnams kyis me la mchod yon nyid //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje dag gis bsang ba sogs dang chur bcas me tog rnams kyis me la mchod yon nyid //
translated: one should make an offering to the fire with the glorious vajra, the sprinkling, and so on, together with water and flowers.

original: de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas sbyin par bya ste rang snying padmar zla ba'i steng du bsgom nas so //
analyzed: de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas sbyin par bya ste rang snying padmar zla ba'i steng du bsgom nas so //
translated: One who is endowed with that yoga should make an offering, having meditated on the moon above the lotus of one's heart.

original: zhal gcig kha dog dkar po dus kyi phyag gi padma g-yon na ril ba chu skyes dag dang ni /
analyzed: zhal gcig kha dog dkar po dus kyi phyag gi padma g-yon na ril ba chu skyes dag dang ni /
translated: One-faced, white in color, holding a lotus in the left hand at the time of eating, with a water-born (conch) in the left hand,

original: 74 / g-yas na dbyug pa bgrang phreng ral pa shin tu ser skya dmar ser mig ldan gos dang bcas pa ste //
analyzed: 74 / g-yas na dbyug pa bgrang phreng ral pa shin tu ser skya dmar ser mig ldan gos dang bcas pa ste //
translated: and a staff and rosary in the right hand, with tawny-red hair, having red eyes, and clothed.

original: me yi snying gar zla ba'i steng du dri med 'phro byed dza: las lcags kyu nges par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: me yi snying gar zla ba'i steng du dri med 'phro byed dza: las lcags kyu nges par bsgom par bya //
translated: In the heart of the fire, on a moon, one should visualize a stainless light, from JAH, a hook,

original: de yis bkug pa'i kun 'gro @44b ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la shin tu ro mnyam dag tu mdzod //
analyzed: de yis bkug pa'i kun 'gro @44b ye shes sems dpa' rang gi lus la shin tu ro mnyam dag tu mdzod //
translated: which summons the all-pervading wisdom being, and makes it completely one with one's own body.

original: de ltar thab la yang ni yang dag 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin me ni spyan drang ngo /ğŸ”½75 / mchog sbyin lag pa dag gi mthe bo yis kyang me yi zhal du sbyin sreg dag ni rab tu bya //
analyzed: de ltar thab la yang ni yang dag 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin me ni spyan drang ngo / 75 / mchog sbyin lag pa dag gi mthe bo yis kyang me yi zhal du sbyin sreg dag ni rab tu bya //
translated: Thus, the fire becomes transformed, and one should invite the fire in the same way, O Lord of Men.ğŸ”½With the thumb of the boon-granting hand, one should make offerings into the fire's mouth.

original: gtso bo'i rdo rje yan lag gis kyang mda' brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang d'ur ba mar dang 'o ma yis //
analyzed: gtso bo'i rdo rje yan lag gis kyang mda' brgya'i yam shing 'bru dang d'ur ba mar dang 'o ma yis //
translated: With the principal vajra limb, one should offer a hundred arrows of kindling, grains, and curd, with ghee and milk.

original: skyil krung du gnas rab tu zhi zhing g-yo ba med pa'i sems ldan gsang sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku //
analyzed: skyil krung du gnas rab tu zhi zhing g-yo ba med pa'i sems ldan gsang sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku //
translated: Seated cross-legged, with a mind of perfect peace and immobility, he is the embodiment of the mantra of the knowledge of the secret mantra.

original: slob dpon las kyi rdo rje can gyis slar yang me la bsregs blugs dag ni nges par sbyin par bya /
analyzed: slob dpon las kyi rdo rje can gyis slar yang me la bsregs blugs dag ni nges par sbyin par bya /
translated: The master, the vajra-holder, should again offer the burnt oblation into the fire.

original: 76 / rim pa yis ni sbyin sreg byas nas 'thor 'thung dag kyang de bzhin me dang bdag nyid dag la yang //
analyzed: 76 / rim pa yis ni sbyin sreg byas nas 'thor 'thung dag kyang de bzhin me dang bdag nyid dag la yang //
translated: Having performed the burnt offering in stages, he should also offer the sprinkling water and the oblation to the fire and himself.

original: dril  sogs dang spos dag phul nas rang snying padmar ye she me ni gshegs su gsol bar bya //
analyzed: dril  sogs dang spos dag phul nas rang snying padmar ye she me ni gshegs su gsol bar bya //
translated: Having offered the bell and incense, he should request the wisdom fire to depart into his own heart lotus.

original: phyi nas slob ma la ni dbang bskur dpal ldan bla ma mtha' dag yon tan gter gyis nges par sbyin //
analyzed: phyi nas slob ma la ni dbang bskur dpal ldan bla ma mtha' dag yon tan gter gyis nges par sbyin //
translated: Afterwards, he should definitely bestow the empowerment upon the disciple, with all the qualities of the glorious guru.

original: dang por bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa dag pa'i slad du'o /
analyzed: dang por bdud rtsi lnga ni rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa dag pa'i slad du'o /
translated: First, the five nectars are consecrated by the supreme victor Vajra.

original: 77 / rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg grub cing rdul tshon btab ste sngags kyi mtshan ma rab tu bkod pa na //
analyzed: 77 / rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg grub cing rdul tshon btab ste sngags kyi mtshan ma rab tu bkod pa na //
translated: Having accomplished the burnt offering with his mantra, having sprinkled the colored powders, and having arranged the signs of the mantra,

original: zur du shel gyi bum pa dkar po skud pa lnga yis dkris pa rnams ni yang dag gzhag par bya //
analyzed: zur du shel gyi bum pa dkar po skud pa lnga yis dkris pa rnams ni yang dag gzhag par bya //
translated: And one should set out to the side white crystal vases wrapped in five-colored cloths.

original: slob dpon shar gyi zhal du rdo rje padma las skyes rab bgrod khro bo'i rgyal po rnams dag gis //
analyzed: slob dpon shar gyi zhal du rdo rje padma las skyes rab bgrod khro bo'i rgyal po rnams dag gis //
translated: The master, having invited the wisdom wheel with the mantras of the wrathful kings born from the vajra and lotus,

original: spyan drangs nas ni ye shes 'khor lo rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam du bya dbang gi don du'o /
analyzed: spyan drangs nas ni ye shes 'khor lo rdul tshon dag la ro mnyam du bya dbang gi don du'o /
translated: he should cause it to be of the same taste as the colored powders for the sake of the empowerment.

original: 78 / lha dang lha mo rnams ni thams cad dag gi ming gi sngon du aom zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: 78 / lha dang lha mo rnams ni thams cad dag gi ming gi sngon du aom zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ste //
translated: And in front of the names of all the gods and goddesses there is Om.

original: sbyin sreg la ni sv'a h'a'i mtha' sngags snying po de bzhin nyid de mchod pa dag lan ma:'i mtha' //
analyzed: sbyin sreg la ni sv'a h'a'i mtha' sngags snying po de bzhin nyid de mchod pa dag lan ma:'i mtha' //
translated: In the burnt offerings, the mantra at the end of the essence mantra is svaha; in the offerings, it is vausat.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: lcags kyu la sogs rim pas yongs su bkod rnams spyan drang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // mnyes la'o mchod yon sbyin pa la yang ai dam gri hna gri hna aa rgha kam me zhes par 'gyur /
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: lcags kyu la sogs rim pas yongs su bkod rnams spyan drang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // mnyes la'o mchod yon sbyin pa la yang ai dam gri hna gri hna aa rgha kam me zhes par 'gyur /
translated: Ja hum bam hoá¸¥ is the sequence of the mantra for the hook and so forth. Ja is for summoning, hum for making enter, bam for binding, and hoá¸¥ for satisfying. Ai dam grihá¹‡a grihá¹‡a arghaá¹ƒ ká¹£antavÃ¢pi is for offering water for welcoming.

original: 79 / rgyas pa la ni sv'a h'a'i mtha' yi sngags su 'gyur te mi bdag zhi ba la 'di na ma:'i mtha' //
analyzed: 79 / rgyas pa la ni sv'a h'a'i mtha' yi sngags su 'gyur te mi bdag zhi ba la 'di na ma:'i mtha' //
translated: For the rite of prosperity, the mantra ends with svÄhÄ; for the rite of peace, with namah, O King.

original: dgug pa la ni boo shat  mtha' ru 'gyur te boo shat  mtha' yang dbang la de bzhin nyid du ni //
analyzed: dgug pa la ni boo shat  mtha' ru 'gyur te boo shat  mtha' yang dbang la de bzhin nyid du ni //
translated: For the rite of summoning, it ends with vauá¹£aá¹­; for the rite of enthralling, with vauá¹£aá¹­ as well.

original: h'um yig mtha' can mngon spyod la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis phat mtha' phur bus gdab sogs la'o //
analyzed: h'um yig mtha' can mngon spyod la ste rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis phat mtha' phur bus gdab sogs la'o //
translated: For the rite of destroying, it ends with the syllable hÅ«á¹ƒ; for the rite of stabbing with a kila, with phaá¹­, by the power of its inherent quality.

original: dkar dang dmar dang nag po mchog gi gser dang mtshungs @45a * //
analyzed: dkar dang dmar dang nag po mchog gi gser dang mtshungs @45a * //
translated: White, red, and black, like the finest gold,

original: pa dag ste las kyi dbye ba dag gis sngags /
analyzed: pa dag ste las kyi dbye ba dag gis sngags /
translated: the mantras, by the division of the rites,

original: 80 / shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje  dag ni sprin nag dang mtshungs byang du sku yi rdo rje dang // lho ru gsung gi rdo rje nub tu yang ni rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa ye shes rdo rje ste //
analyzed: 80 / shar du dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje  dag ni sprin nag dang mtshungs byang du sku yi rdo rje dang // lho ru gsung gi rdo rje nub tu yang ni rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa ye shes rdo rje ste //
translated: are in the east, glorious Vajra Mind, like a black cloud; in the north, Vajra Body; in the south, Vajra Speech; and in the west, Vajra Wisdom, abiding in its own family direction.

original: dkar dang dmar dang ser po dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis sa yi cha la khyab par byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: dkar dang dmar dang ser po dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis sa yi cha la khyab par byed par 'gyur //
translated: White, red, and yellow, they pervade the quarters by the power of the families.

original: rlung me chu dang sa yi lha rnams dag gi skye ba'i gnas ni mi bdag ai ri au li'o /
analyzed: rlung me chu dang sa yi lha rnams dag gi skye ba'i gnas ni mi bdag ai ri au li'o /
translated: The places of birth of the gods of wind, fire, water, and earth are the vowels I, I, U, and U.

original: 81 / aom a'a: h'um ni phyag rgya gsum ste sv'a h'a'i tshig dang bcas pa ring po'i dbye ba las kyang lnga //
analyzed: 81 / aom a'a: h'um ni phyag rgya gsum ste sv'a h'a'i tshig dang bcas pa ring po'i dbye ba las kyang lnga //
translated: Om, Ah, Hum are the three seals, along with the word Svaha. From the division of the long vowels, there are five.

original: h'um a'a: aom ho: rang gi zhal rnams gzhan pa dag kyang de bzhin gzhom du med pa lnga par 'gyur //
analyzed: h'um a'a: aom ho: rang gi zhal rnams gzhan pa dag kyang de bzhin gzhom du med pa lnga par 'gyur //
translated: Hum, Ah, Om, Ho, are the other faces. Likewise, the five are invincible.

original: aa sogs dang bcas hram yig drug ste ro rkang na ma: sogs kyi dpal ldan yan lag drug tu 'gyur //
analyzed: aa sogs dang bcas hram yig drug ste ro rkang na ma: sogs kyi dpal ldan yan lag drug tu 'gyur //
translated: With the letters A and so forth, there are six. With the letters of the feet, the glorious six limbs are formed.

original: phrim gyi yi ge sna tshogs  yum gyir 'gyur te rnam bcu brtsegs pa'i sngags ni rgyal ba dag gi'o /
analyzed: phrim gyi yi ge sna tshogs  yum gyir 'gyur te rnam bcu brtsegs pa'i sngags ni rgyal ba dag gi'o /
translated: The letter Phrem is the mother of the various. The mantra of the ten-formed one is the victors.

original: 82 / h'um yig ye shes sa bon snying po dag kyang brtsegs pa chen po'i sngags ni zhal dang bcas pa ste //
analyzed: 82 / h'um yig ye shes sa bon snying po dag kyang brtsegs pa chen po'i sngags ni zhal dang bcas pa ste //
translated: The seed of the wisdom Hum is the essence. The mantra of the great one is the face.

original: hr'am yig la sogs yan lag drug po sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan pa 'di ni nye snying ngo //
analyzed: hr'am yig la sogs yan lag drug po sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan pa 'di ni nye snying ngo //
translated: The six limbs beginning with the letter Hram are the first of the vajra body. This is the quintessence.

original: lha dang lha mo rnams kyi phreng ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan te las kyi dbye ba du ma yis //
analyzed: lha dang lha mo rnams kyi phreng ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan te las kyi dbye ba du ma yis //
translated: The mantras of the garlands of gods and goddesses are different, due to the many divisions of action.

original: rnam mang du 'gyur shes par bya ste dus 'khor dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so /
analyzed: rnam mang du 'gyur shes par bya ste dus 'khor dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis so /
translated: They should be known to be manifold, in this Kalachakra mandala, by the power of the qualities of the nature.ğŸ”½With many kinds of ornaments, gold, moon, flowers, garments, scents, incense, lamps,

original: 83 / rin chen gser zla me tog dang ni rnam pa mang po'i gos dang dri dang spos dang mar me dang // dril bu me long bla re dang ni rnam mang 'bras bu ba dan sogs dang gar dang rol mo yis /
analyzed: 83 / rin chen gser zla me tog dang ni rnam pa mang po'i gos dang dri dang spos dang mar me dang // dril bu me long bla re dang ni rnam mang 'bras bu ba dan sogs dang gar dang rol mo yis /
translated: bells, mirrors, canopies, fruits, banners, and so forth, with dance and music,

original: rnam bkra mchod pa byas te gzhan pa rnam bcu dag kyang bdag nyid nus pas ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin //
analyzed: rnam bkra mchod pa byas te gzhan pa rnam bcu dag kyang bdag nyid nus pas ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin //
translated: one should make a colorful offering, and also the other ten, to the best of one's ability, as taught.

original: slob dpon dag gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar mchog gi bu yis yon ni dag pa'i slad du dbul bar bya /
analyzed: slob dpon dag gi zhabs kyi rtsa bar mchog gi bu yis yon ni dag pa'i slad du dbul bar bya /
translated: The supreme son should offer a gift to the feet of the masters for the sake of purification.

original: 84 / dag pa gsum gyi rdzas dang bdag nyid bu dang bu mo dang bcas rigs las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma //
analyzed: 84 / dag pa gsum gyi rdzas dang bdag nyid bu dang bu mo dang bcas rigs las skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma //
translated: The substances of the three purities, oneself, one's son, and one's daughter, and a maiden born into a good family,

original: de ring nyid nas mi bzang 'khor bas 'jigs pa bdag ni rgyal ba rnams la skyabs su lhag par mchi //
analyzed: de ring nyid nas mi bzang 'khor bas 'jigs pa bdag ni rgyal ba rnams la skyabs su lhag par mchi //
translated: From this day forward, I, a good man, terrified of samsara, go for refuge to the Victorious Ones.

original: khyed kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes nges par srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog dag la lus ngag sems ni dag pas so //
analyzed: khyed kyi zhabs kyi chu skyes nges par srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog dag la lus ngag sems ni dag pas so //
translated: With a pure body, speech, and mind, I bow down to the lotus at your feet, which is certain to steal the fear of existence.

original: zhes pa gser bcas me tog dag gis mandala byas nas bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab par 'gyur /
analyzed: zhes pa gser bcas me tog dag gis mandala byas nas bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab par 'gyur /
translated: Having made a mandala of flowers and gold, one should supplicate the guru.

original: 85 /'dod pa'i rdo rje la ni rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma dag spyi bos gzung bar bgyi //
analyzed: 85 /'dod pa'i rdo rje la ni rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma dag spyi bos gzung bar bgyi //
translated: One should hold the vajra, bell, and mudra of the guru on the top of oneâ€™s head.

original: rin chen la ni sbyin pa sbyin @45b bgyi 'khor lo 'di la rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi //
analyzed: rin chen la ni sbyin pa sbyin @45b bgyi 'khor lo 'di la rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi //
translated: One should give gifts to the jewel, and on the wheel one should maintain the pledge of the supreme Victor.

original: ral gri la ni mchod pa bgyi ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs la sdom pa dag ni bskyang bar bgyi //
analyzed: ral gri la ni mchod pa bgyi ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs la sdom pa dag ni bskyang bar bgyi //
translated: One should make offerings to the sword, and on the clear lotus family one should maintain the vows.

original: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la byang chub bdag gis bskyed par bgyi /
analyzed: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la byang chub bdag gis bskyed par bgyi /
translated: For the sake of liberating sentient beings, I will generate enlightenment in the family that generates the Victorious Ones.

original: 86 / slob ma khrus byas dri yis rjes byugs brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan shar gyi sar ni bzhag byas te //ğŸ”½dngos grub don du so shing rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rje dag gis mngon par bsngags pa rab sbyin bya //
analyzed: 86 / slob ma khrus byas dri yis rjes byugs brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan shar gyi sar ni bzhag byas te // dngos grub don du so shing rgyal ba mchog gi rdo rje dag gis mngon par bsngags pa rab sbyin bya //
translated: The disciple, having bathed, anointed with perfumes, firm in his vow, is placed by the teacher in the eastern direction.ğŸ”½For the sake of power, he should be given a tooth-stick, consecrated with the mantra of the Supreme Victor Vajra.

original: lce la'ang bdud rtsi nges par rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig dag gis spos ni dbab pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: lce la'ang bdud rtsi nges par rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig dag gis spos ni dbab pa'i don du'o //
translated: And on his tongue, he should definitely place nectar, consecrated with the pledge of the Supreme Victor, for the sake of descent of the deity.

original: sngags ni h'um gi yi ge gcig ste aa ra la dang bcas pa khro bo'i gtso bo bskul ba'o /
analyzed: sngags ni h'um gi yi ge gcig ste aa ra la dang bcas pa khro bo'i gtso bo bskul ba'o /
translated: The mantra is the single syllable hÅ«á¹ƒ, together with Ära-lÄ«, invoking the Lord of Wrath.

original: 87 / khro bo'i rgyal po phebs na mtshon chas mdzes pa'i lag pa dag gis bdud kyi tshogs la bsdigs byed cing //
analyzed: 87 / khro bo'i rgyal po phebs na mtshon chas mdzes pa'i lag pa dag gis bdud kyi tshogs la bsdigs byed cing //
translated: When the King of Wrath has descended, with his weapons-adorned hands he threatens the hosts of demons.

original: g-yon brkyang la sogs stabs rnams dang ni rnam mang bcing bdag gis rdo rje'i gar gyi gar byed de //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang la sogs stabs rnams dang ni rnam mang bcing bdag gis rdo rje'i gar gyi gar byed de //
translated: With the postures such as the left leg extended, and with the many bonds, he performs the dance of the vajra dance.

original: bzhad dang h'um gi yi ge 'dres pa dgra la 'jigs pa ster ba dang ni rdo rje'i glu yang byed //
analyzed: bzhad dang h'um gi yi ge 'dres pa dgra la 'jigs pa ster ba dang ni rdo rje'i glu yang byed //
translated: With laughter and the syllable hÅ«á¹ƒ mixed in, he gives fear to the enemy and also sings the vajra song.

original: ngo tsha med cing dogs pa med par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha gzhan dag kyang zhi ba'o /
analyzed: ngo tsha med cing dogs pa med par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha gzhan dag kyang zhi ba'o /
translated: They are without shame and without fear, and the other gods are pacified by their qualities.

original: 88 / sku phebs pas ni rnal 'byor ldan pa rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sku yi bya ba byed pa ste //
analyzed: 88 / sku phebs pas ni rnal 'byor ldan pa rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sku yi bya ba byed pa ste //
translated: By the descent of the body, the yogi becomes the one who performs the bodily actions by the power of the natural qualities.

original: gsung phebs pas ni lha dang 'byung po lha min rnams las rnam par rgyal ba'i smra ba po ru 'gyur //
analyzed: gsung phebs pas ni lha dang 'byung po lha min rnams las rnam par rgyal ba'i smra ba po ru 'gyur //
translated: By the descent of speech, he becomes the one who speaks, victorious over the gods, spirits, and demigods.

original: thugs phebs pas ni gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa dag dang byung dang 'byung ba thams cad shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: thugs phebs pas ni gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa dag dang byung dang 'byung ba thams cad shes par 'gyur //
translated: By the descent of the mind, he knows the thoughts of others, what is in their minds, and all that has happened and will happen.

original: ye shes phebs pas sangs rgyas bla ma yi yang bla ma rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i ston pa gcig pur 'gyur /
analyzed: ye shes phebs pas sangs rgyas bla ma yi yang bla ma rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i ston pa gcig pur 'gyur /
translated: By the descent of wisdom, he becomes the sole teacher, endowed with miraculous powers, even greater than the Buddha, the guru of gurus.

original: 89 / sa phebs pas ni rnal 'byor pa dag ri dang mtshungs par 'gyur te chus kyang bsil bar rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 89 / sa phebs pas ni rnal 'byor pa dag ri dang mtshungs par 'gyur te chus kyang bsil bar rab tu 'gyur //
translated: By the descent of earth, the yogi becomes like a mountain, and is also cooled by water.

original: me phebs pas ni sreg par 'gyur te rlung gis kyang ni de bzhin skam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: me phebs pas ni sreg par 'gyur te rlung gis kyang ni de bzhin skam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
translated: By the descent of fire, he becomes one who burns, and by the descent of wind, he becomes one who dries up.

original: stong pa phebs pas mi snang bar 'gyur sa steng du ni mkha' la spyod pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: stong pa phebs pas mi snang bar 'gyur sa steng du ni mkha' la spyod pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
translated: By the descent of the Void, one becomes invisible, and one becomes a sky-farer on the face of the earth.

original: de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rim pa yis ni rig par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rim pa yis ni rig par bya /
translated: Thus, all things, such as form, etc., should be known in order, by the power of the qualities of their natures.

original: 90 / dbab pa la ni nges par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sngags pa rnams kyi bsgom pa'i stobs dang ni //
analyzed: 90 / dbab pa la ni nges par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po sngags pa rnams kyi bsgom pa'i stobs dang ni //
translated: The descent is certain, O King, by the power of the meditation of the mantrins,

original: bsnyen pa'i dbye ba dang ni rnam mang dam tshig sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis 'ga' zhig @46a * //ğŸ”½dag gi tshe //
analyzed: bsnyen pa'i dbye ba dang ni rnam mang dam tshig sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis 'ga' zhig @46a * // dag gi tshe //
translated: and by the many divisions of the service, and by the many pledges, and by the recitation of the mantras, etc.

original: sangs rgyas ro myong byed pas bdud rtsi'i dbang las dkyil 'khor 'ga' zhig tu ni mchog gi bu la'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ro myong byed pas bdud rtsi'i dbang las dkyil 'khor 'ga' zhig tu ni mchog gi bu la'o //
translated: By the experience of the taste of Buddhahood, in some mandalas, the supreme son is empowered by the nectar.

original: rang byin brlabs pas dman pa rnam mang srid pa dag gis sngags pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa min /
analyzed: rang byin brlabs pas dman pa rnam mang srid pa dag gis sngags pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa min /
translated: By self-consecration, there is no accomplishment for the mantrins by the many inferior existences.

original: 91 / phebs pa btang ste phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying ga spyi gtsug lte ba dag dang mgrin pa dang // gsang bar rgyal ba dang ni rang gi rigs kyi sar gnas rang gi rdo rje gsum gyis bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: 91 / phebs pa btang ste phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying ga spyi gtsug lte ba dag dang mgrin pa dang // gsang bar rgyal ba dang ni rang gi rigs kyi sar gnas rang gi rdo rje gsum gyis bsrung bar bya //
translated: Having sent him off, he should be protected by the three vajras of his own family, in the head, heart, navel, throat, and secret place, in the stage of the Victorious One and his own family.

original: lus la ser po'i gos dag byin te mig ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i slob ma 'dir ni gzhug par bya //
analyzed: lus la ser po'i gos dag byin te mig ni bsgribs par gyur pa'i slob ma 'dir ni gzhug par bya //
translated: Having given him yellow garments to wear and having covered his eyes, he should be brought into the mandala.

original: kun rdzob don du brtul zhugs rab mchog bgrod pa dag la bgrod pa de dag nyid ni sbyin par bya /
analyzed: kun rdzob don du brtul zhugs rab mchog bgrod pa dag la bgrod pa de dag nyid ni sbyin par bya /
translated: For the sake of the relative, he should be given the supreme observances, the observances of the path.

original: 92 /'che dang mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spang bya gzhan gyi nor dang chang gi btung ba de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: 92 /'che dang mi bden gzhan gyi bud med spang bya gzhan gyi nor dang chang gi btung ba de bzhin nyid //
translated: He should abandon going to other menâ€™s wives, other menâ€™s property, and alcohol.

original: 'khor bar rdo rje'i zhags pa dag ste rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dag go //
analyzed: 'khor bar rdo rje'i zhags pa dag ste rang gi dge ba 'joms byed sdig pa lnga po 'di dag go //
translated: These are the five sins that destroy oneâ€™s virtue and are the vajra fetters of saá¹ƒsÄra.

original: gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi mtshan gyis rab sbyin bya ;
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi mtshan gyis rab sbyin bya ;
translated: Whenever they occur, they should be purified by the name of the guru of gods and humans.

original: / sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' 'di srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag ste khyod kyis kyang ni bskyang bar bya /
analyzed: / sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' 'di srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dag ste khyod kyis kyang ni bskyang bar bya /
translated: These are the words of the chief of the various (Buddhas), which destroy the fears of existence. You must also protect them.

original: 93 / cho lo kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos //
analyzed: 93 / cho lo kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min dbang po'i chos //
translated: Do not play dice, eat forbidden food, read bad books, or worship spirits, demons, or the lord of the demigods.

original: ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha mi'i bla ma gsod pa lnga ni mi bya'o //
translated: Do not kill cows, children, women, men, or the teacher of gods and men.

original: grogs po rje bo rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu ba yang //
analyzed: grogs po rje bo rnams dang lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun yid brtan rnams la 'khu ba yang //
translated: Do not betray your friends, masters, gods, men, teachers, or the Sangha.

original: dbang po rnams ni chags pa dag dang de ltar srid pa'i bdag po dag gi brtul zhugs nyi shu lnga /ğŸ”½94 / dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te lag pa'i padma sbyar bar me tog gcig ni rab sbyin bya //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni chags pa dag dang de ltar srid pa'i bdag po dag gi brtul zhugs nyi shu lnga / 94 / dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te lag pa'i padma sbyar bar me tog gcig ni rab sbyin bya //
translated: These are the twenty-five vows of the lords of existence, who are attached to the senses.ğŸ”½Having blessed it with the glorious mantra, offer a flower to the joined palms.

original: dang por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i padma sbyar ba dag las dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor //
analyzed: dang por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i padma sbyar ba dag las dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor //
translated: First, having circumambulated three times, throw the flower into the maá¹‡á¸ala from the joined palms.

original: gang gi gnas su me tog bzang po lhung ba de ni mi yi bdag po de yi rigs su nges //
analyzed: gang gi gnas su me tog bzang po lhung ba de ni mi yi bdag po de yi rigs su nges //
translated: The family of that king is ascertained to be that into which a good flower has fallen.

original: phyi nas dbang ni bdun po dag dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji bzhin bla med yang dag rab sbyin bya /ğŸ”½95 / klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas //
analyzed: phyi nas dbang ni bdun po dag dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji bzhin bla med yang dag rab sbyin bya / 95 / klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas //
translated: Then, the seven empowerments and the three higher ones should be bestowed here in the proper way, the perfect and unsurpassable.ğŸ”½The goddesses bathe the disciples with the vase of the jewel of the four nagas, or the king of the nature of the earth, endowed with jewels,

original: sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o //
analyzed: sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o //
translated: filled with medicine and scent, the victorious and most victorious vases.

original: sangs rgyas rab tu dbye bas cod pan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rab tu dbye bas cod pan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs nyid //
translated: The supreme guru gives the crown empowerment with the division of the buddhas, and the goddesses give the silk ribbons.

original: rdo @46b rje dril bu nyi zla las te brtul zhugs dag kyang dbang por bcas pa'i yul gyis sbyar bar bya /
analyzed: rdo @46b rje dril bu nyi zla las te brtul zhugs dag kyang dbang por bcas pa'i yul gyis sbyar bar bya /
translated: The vajra and bell are from the sun and moon, and the observances are applied with the sense objects.

original: 96 / khro bo rnams kyis byams sogs ming ste gsal bar rgyal ba'i bdag pos rjes gnang 'dogs bcas rab tu sbyin //
analyzed: 96 / khro bo rnams kyis byams sogs ming ste gsal bar rgyal ba'i bdag pos rjes gnang 'dogs bcas rab tu sbyin //
translated: The wrathful ones give the name of love, and so on, and the clear permission of the Victorious One is bestowed with the crown.

original: rdo rje dril bu rab tu byin nas rab mchog snying rje dag gis dag pa'i chos ni bstan par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu rab tu byin nas rab mchog snying rje dag gis dag pa'i chos ni bstan par bya //
translated: Having given the vajra and the bell, one should teach the Dharma that is pure with the highest compassion.

original: nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag  la ni srog gcod bya ste ral gri la yang bden pa min pa'i tshig / rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog bya mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid la yang gzhan gyi bud med dbrog /ğŸ”½97 / chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni bsten par bya //
analyzed: nges par rdo rje'i rigs dag  la ni srog gcod bya ste ral gri la yang bden pa min pa'i tshig / rin chen la ni gzhan nor dbrog bya mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid la yang gzhan gyi bud med dbrog / 97 / chang dang sgron ma sangs rgyas rnams dang bzang po'i yul rnams mtha' dag 'khor lo la ni bsten par bya //
translated: â€œOne should kill on the vajra family, and on the sword family one should tell lies; on the jewel family one should steal the wealth of others, and on the lotus family one should take the wives of others.

original: gdol pa mo sogs mtha' dag bud med rnams ni gri gug la yang mkha' yi padmar smad mi bya //
analyzed: gdol pa mo sogs mtha' dag bud med rnams ni gri gug la yang mkha' yi padmar smad mi bya //
translated: â€œOne should rely on the wheel family, the beer, the lamp, the buddhas, and all the good objects; and on the kÄ«la family one should not despise any woman, even a caá¹‡á¸Äla woman, or the lotus of the sky.

original: sems can don gyi slad du nor dang bcas pa'i lus 'di sbyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung mi bya //
analyzed: sems can don gyi slad du nor dang bcas pa'i lus 'di sbyin par bya ste khyod kyis bsrung mi bya //
translated: â€œFor the sake of sentient beings, one should give this body with its wealth; one should not protect it.

original: rigs kyi bu kye sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba gzhan du mtha' yas bskal pas min par rgyal bas gsungs /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu kye sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba gzhan du mtha' yas bskal pas min par rgyal bas gsungs /
translated: â€œO son of good family, the Victor has said that one will become a buddha in another limitless eon, not otherwise.

original: 98 / chu ni sgrol ma la sogs lha mo cod pan zhes pa rgyal ba dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs nus ma rnams //
analyzed: 98 / chu ni sgrol ma la sogs lha mo cod pan zhes pa rgyal ba dpa' bo'i dar dpyangs nus ma rnams //
translated: The water, the goddesses LocanÄ and so on, the diadem, the heroes, the banners, the maidens,

original: rdo rje dril bu nyid zla dag dang brtul zhugs dag kyang yul te ming ni byams sogs sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu nyid zla dag dang brtul zhugs dag kyang yul te ming ni byams sogs sbyor ba'o //
translated: the vajra and bell, the moon, the observances, and the objects, the name, the union with Maitreya and so on,

original: rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal mo srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa ste //
analyzed: rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal mo srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa ste //
translated: the permission, the glorious perfect enlightenment, the destruction of the terrors of existence, the wheel of time, the subsequent knowledge,

original: sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bskur bdun po 'di dag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab sbyin bya /
analyzed: sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bskur bdun po 'di dag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab sbyin bya /
translated: these seven initiations, which steal away the stains of sin, should be bestowed in the maá¹‡á¸ala.

original: 99 / dbang bdun dag gis mngon par dbang bskur dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun gyi ni dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: 99 / dbang bdun dag gis mngon par dbang bskur dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun gyi ni dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur //
translated: By the seven initiations one is consecrated, and by the power of the virtues one becomes a lord of the seven levels.

original: bum pa gsang bas mngon par dbang bskur slar yang phyir mi ldog pa sogs su nges par rab tu 'jug / shes rab ye shes dag gis mngon par dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: bum pa gsang bas mngon par dbang bskur slar yang phyir mi ldog pa sogs su nges par rab tu 'jug / shes rab ye shes dag gis mngon par dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur //
translated: One who has been fully initiated with the wisdom and gnosis initiations will become Manjushri, the conqueror of the fears of existence.

original: gal te g-yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dmyal bar 'gro ste 'di dag sdug bsngal lo /
analyzed: gal te g-yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dmyal bar 'gro ste 'di dag sdug bsngal lo /
translated: If one commits a root downfall through the power of deceit, one will go to hell. These are the sufferings.

original: 100 / rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te yon tan ldan pa dbang bdun la gnas dag gi'o //
analyzed: 100 / rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te yon tan ldan pa dbang bdun la gnas dag gi'o //
translated: One who is pure of root downfalls will have the qualities of abiding in the seven initiations.

original: bum pa gsang ba la ni gal te brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang gis gong ma la @47a * //
analyzed: bum pa gsang ba la ni gal te brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang gis gong ma la @47a * //
translated: If one has the vase and secret initiations, one will not be pure if one commits a root downfall through the power of a vow.

original: ni dag pa med //
analyzed: ni dag pa med //
translated: If one has the higher initiations, one will not be pure.

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na gang zhig dag pa'i slad du slar yang dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya ste //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na gang zhig dag pa'i slad du slar yang dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya ste //
translated: If one commits a root downfall, one should re-enter this mandala in order to be purified.

original: rjes su gnang ba thob nas slar yang tshogs kyi 'dus par thu bo'i ming ni chung ba nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: rjes su gnang ba thob nas slar yang tshogs kyi 'dus par thu bo'i ming ni chung ba nyid du 'gyur /
translated: Having received the subsequent authorization, one will again be the youngest in the assembly of the elders.

original: 101 / dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs dkrugs pa las bu rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: 101 / dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs dkrugs pa las bu rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: The root downfall of the sons occurs through disturbing the mind of the glorious guru.

original: de yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan du 'gyur te nges par de bzhin spun la khros pas gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de yi bka' la 'gongs pas gzhan du 'gyur te nges par de bzhin spun la khros pas gsum pa'o //
translated: The second is through transgressing his word; the third, through anger toward a brother;

original: byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las kyang mda' ru 'gyur //
analyzed: byams pa btang bas bzhi par 'gyur te byang chub sems ni rab tu nyams pa las kyang mda' ru 'gyur //
translated: The fourth, through abandoning love; the fifth, through abandoning the thought of awakening.

original: drug pa grub pa'i mtha' la smod pa ri bo dag kyang ma smin mi la gsang ba byin las so /
analyzed: drug pa grub pa'i mtha' la smod pa ri bo dag kyang ma smin mi la gsang ba byin las so /
translated: The sixth, through disparaging the philosophical tenets; the seventh, through revealing the secret to the unripened;

original: 102 / phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te slar yang dgu pa dag pa'i chos la ma dad gang //
analyzed: 102 / phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te slar yang dgu pa dag pa'i chos la ma dad gang //
translated: The eighth, through being a naga due to the aggregates and afflictions; the ninth, through lack of faith in the pure Dharma.

original: sgyu yi byams pa dang ni ming sogs bral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o //
analyzed: sgyu yi byams pa dang ni ming sogs bral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o //
translated: The tenth, through hypocrisy; the eleventh, through abandoning the name and so forth; the twelfth, through abandoning the bestowal of bliss;

original: dag pa'i sems can dag la skyon brjod pa las nyi ma dam tshig thob pa gtong ba las kyang gzhan //
analyzed: dag pa'i sems can dag la skyon brjod pa las nyi ma dam tshig thob pa gtong ba las kyang gzhan //
translated: The thirteenth, through conceptualization; the fourteenth, through anger; the fifteenth, through revealing the faults of pure beings;ğŸ”½The sixteenth, through abandoning the commitments; the seventeenth, through abandoning the master;

original: bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje'i theg par gnas par rnams la'o /ğŸ”½103 / klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal pos yi rang bzhin rin chen bcas //ğŸ”½sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis gdan gyi dbus su khrus byas te //ğŸ”½klu dag gis ni dpal ldan cod pan bcings te nor 'dab padmar bzhi yis dar dpyangs bcing bar bya //
